Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Isabel is 48 years old, divorced and currently lives with three of her children. Isabel wants this loan in order to buy some chickens and chicken feed. Isabel wants to give the chickens enough food so that the will be at a good weight to sell in the neighbouring areas. This will give Isabel a higher income. In the future, Isabel hopes to give her family a better quality of life, more financial stability, and she wants to be able to continue in this work. This is the first loan that Isabel has received from "Fudecosur". She has had no previous loan with state banks and "Fudecosur" is providing this loan with better conditions and much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy vegetables, fruits and grains.

loans.name: Rafat

texts.en:
Rafat is a 39-year-old married man from Rafah city. He is a father with five sons and one daughter. For the past few years, Rafat has been working in transferring goods for the local traders in his car. It is a good business and earns a good income. Rafat would like to improve his business but he does not have enough money. 

Rafat took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more products, like grocery products, and transfer them to the local traders. by applying this loan, Rafat's income will be increased and also his productivity.   Rafat appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy more products, like grocery products, and transfer them to the local traders

loans.name: Vicente

texts.es:
Vicente, está acompañado, sus hijos ya son independientes, debido a su trabajo  vive solo, sus actividades económicas son crianza de cerdos, aves de corral y siembra de granos básicos, sus conocimientos los aprendió de su padre, ya tiene 10 años realizándolo de manera independiente. Su ventaja es que las tierras en las que trabaja son propias.
El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de materiales de construcción y concentrados para cerdos, le ayudara a mejorar las instalaciones de la granja de pollos y a alimentar de manera adecuada a los cerdos para luego venderlos a mejor precio y tener mayores ganancias.
 Anhela a continuar trabajando para mejorar su calidad de vida y aumentar la rentabilidad de su negocio.
texts.en:
Vicente has a partner. His children are now independent adults. Vicente lives alone because of his work. Vicente works raising pigs and fowl and growing basic grains. Vicente learned this work from his father and he has now been working autonomously for ten years. Vicente has the advantage that he owns the land where he works.

Vicente will invest this loan in building materials and pig feed. This will help him to improve the chicken farm structures and to give the pigs good food in order to sell them for a better price, giving him higher profits.

Vicente would really like to continue working in order to improve his quality of life and to make his business more profitable.

loans.use: to buy building materials and pig feed.

loans.name: Cecilia Margarita

texts.es:
Cecilia, es una ama de casa de 31 años, es casada su esposo tiene 33 años, tiene dos hijos que están estudiando, para tener recursos económicos se dedica a la siembra de granos básicos, por el momento tiene una manzana de tierra cultivada con maíz, es una actividad que realiza desde muy joven, trabaja todos los días, es apoyada por su familia.
Invertirá el crédito en la compra de abono, fertilizantes, plaguicidas, herbicidas, lo que le permitirá tener una cosecha libre de plagas y granos de calidad, espera tener muy buenas ganancias con las que cumplirá con el pago de las cuotas y cubrirá los gastos familiares.
Sueña con ampliar el área de siembra para aumentar la cosecha y mejorar su economía con la que ofrecerá un mejor estilo de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Cecilia is 31 years old and a housewife. She is married - her husband is 33 years old - and they have two children, both of whom are in school. In order to earn an income, Cecilia works growing basic grains. She has a plot of land (measuring 1.75 acres) where she grows corn. Cecilia has been doing this work since a very young age. She works every day and receives support from her family.

Cecilia will invest this loan in buying manure, fertilisers, disease treatments and weed-killers. This will allow Cecilia to have a disease-free harvest, and good quality grains. Cecilia hopes to have very good profits in order to make the loan repayments and cover household costs.

Cecilia dreams of expanding the land where she grows crops in order to increase her yield and improve her financial situation. She would then be able to offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilisers, disease treatments and weed-killers.

loans.name: Gloria Elena

texts.es:
Gloria, a sus 47 años de edad, es madre soltera de un hijo de 13 años al que ha sacado adelante con gran empeño y dedicación.
La necesidad de generar recursos para solventar los gastos de su familia, la obligaron a buscar alternativas de vida, razón por la que inició desde hace 15 años con la venta de mercancía como ropa, tenis, medias, labor que realiza todos los días sin un horario específico, pues depende del tiempo en que sus clientes la puedan atender y, para complementar los ingresos también tiene un puesto de venta de comidas rápidas en el que trabaja sola de jueves a domingo en las noches; así ha logrado brindar sustento, alimentación vestido y educación a su único hijo.
El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en el fortalecimiento de sus negocios, pues comprará mercancía  e insumos al por mayor (jeans, camisetas, tenis, medias escolares, carnes frías, gaseosas y salsas, entre otros), esto le permitirá continuar con ambas labores y podrá aumentar el nivel de utilidades por venta.
El sueño de Gloria es abrir un local comercial en el que pueda ofrecer sus productos y brindar un mejor servicio al cliente, dando paso a un incremento en la rentabilidad, así podrá ofrecer una mejor educación secundaria y universitaria a su hijo para que se convierta en un profesional próspero, íntegro y exitoso.
texts.en:
Gloria, 47, is a single mother. Her son is 13 years old and she has managed to raise him with great effort and dedication.

She needed to generate an income to cover the family’s expenses, so she had to look for a way to do it. This is why fifteen years ago she decided to start selling different things such as clothes, sneakers and socks. She works every day, with no particular schedule, because she has to wait until her customers have time to see her. As an additional activity, she has a food stall where she sells fast food. She works alone, at night, from Thursday to Sunday. This way, she has managed to give her only child support, food, clothing and education.

She is requesting a loan to strengthen her business. She will buy merchandise and supplies in bulk (jeans, shirts, sneakers, school socks, cold cuts, beverages, sauces, etc.). This will help her to continue with both activities and improve the profits from her sales.

Gloria’s dream is to open a store where she can offer her products and provide a better customer service. This will result in a more profitable business, which will help her to pay a better education for her son (both high school and university). He will then become an honest, prosperous and successful professional.

loans.use: to buy merchandise and supplies in bulk (jeans, shirts, sneakers, school socks, cold cuts, beverages, sauces, etc.).

loans.name: Wajdi

texts.en:
Wajdi is 22 years old. He is single and lives in a rented house in a sector in Jordan called Zarqa with his only brother and his parents. His father is a retired man. 

Wajdi is a diploma student majoring in civil engineering. He is in his second year. He is planning to work in his study field after graduation in order to support his parents financially as they are facing financial crisis which is not helping them in paying his upcoming semester fees. For this reason, he has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for his upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Najeyeh

texts.en:
Najeyeh was born in 1974. She is married and lives in a sector in Jordan called Madaba with her retired husband and her six sons and daughters. 

Najeyeh has been trying her best to support her husband in covering their children's needs by running her project of clothes and cosmetics sales for three years. She started her project selling a small quantity of items. Now she needs to buy a larger quantity of clothes and cosmetic products in order to raise her sales. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To buy more clothes and cosmetic products for her business

loans.name: Thaera

texts.en:
Thaera is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in the photo.

Thaera is a thirty-nine-year-old woman from Qalqilia city. She is married and mother to one son and three daughters. Her husband works as an employee in a local firm where he earns a low income, so for the past 3 years, he has also worked as a farmer on his land. This land is providing a good farming project but it needs a lot of improvement.

Thaera is taking a loan of 2,000 USD from FATEN. This loan will help her husband buy some farming tools. By taking this loan, Thaera's husband will be able to develop his project and increase his productivity, to grow the family's income.

loans.use: To help her husband to buy some farming tools to help him in his farm

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is 23 years old. He is single and lives with his parents and 7 siblings in a sector in Jordan called Irbid. His a university student majoring in Engineering and Technology. He is in his 2nd year. Mohammad is planning to work in his field of study after graduation.  He hopes to start helping his parents financially. Now he doesn't have enough money to pay for his upcoming semester fees. For this reason, he has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for his upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a new refrigerator and more food products

loans.name: Marwa

texts.en: Marwa is a 19 years old.  She lives in Irbid, Jordan, with her family consisting of 3 siblings and her parents. Marwa is at the end of her 2nd year, studying for a Bachelor of Business Administration.  She is planning to earn her degree in order to work in her field of study after graduation.  This will help her parents financially, as they are currently facing a financial crisis and unable to pay for her semester fees.  For this reason, she applied for this loan.

loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy organic fertilizers and renovate his farm.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 50-year-old married man from the city of Rafah. He is a father with four sons and one daughter. He works as an employee in the public sector where he earns a low income that barely covers all of the family's needs. Mohammad would like to improve his home and buy all of the necessities, but he does not have enough money. 

Mohammad took a loan from FATEN to buy a solar system for heating water and a tank for his home. The loan will allow Mohammad to provide hot water for his family, especially in the winter

Mohammad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water and a tank for his home.

loans.name: Mutaz

texts.en: Mutaz is 27 years old. He is single and lives in a sector in Jordan called Baqaa with his 3 siblings and his parents. Mutaz is studying for his Masters degree, majoring in Marketing. He is in his 2nd year and at the same time works at a governmental entity. He is planning to find a better job after graduation, in order to be a good financial support for his family. But he doesn't have enough money to pay for his upcoming semester fees, and has therefore applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for his upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Rasmia

texts.en:
Rasmia is a conservative person who asked her daughter to take her place in the photo. 

Rasmia is a 50-year-old married woman who works in a school to be able to support her five children. Her husband is not working because of his old age. Now Rasmia has a daughter who is 21 years old and single, and she has applied for this loan to pay for Haya's second semester at the university.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's first semester fees

loans.name: Feda

texts.en: Feda was born in 1950. She is a widow living in a sector in Jordan called Southern Ghour, with her 6 sons and daughters. Feda has been raising goats for a year. She started her project raising a few goats, in order support her children financially. Now she needs to buy more goats to raise her productivity and to buy more food for them. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To buy more goats and more food for them

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en: Mariam was born in 1971. She is a divorced woman living alone in a sector in Jordan called Wihdat. she is trying her best to support herself by running her project of making accessories and embroidery at home and selling them to people in her neighborhood. She started this project 10 years ago. Mariam also works as a photographer. Now she needs to buy more materials for making more accessories and embroidery to raise her productivity. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To buy more materials for making accessories and embroidery

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 25-year-old single man from the city of Rafah. He lives with his family in a small, simple house. Ahmad works as an employee in a local firm where he earns a low income that is barely enough to cover all of his needs. Ahmad is a student at a local university, where he studies business administration. He would like to finish his studies and earn a BA degree so he can get a better job. 

Ahmad is taking a Murabaha loan from FATEN to help him to buy a new laptop for his studies. With the help of this loan, Ahmad will be able to do his homework and write reports easily

Ahmad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his studies

loans.name: Khaled

texts.en:
Khaled is an 18-year-old single man from Rafah city. He lives with his family in a small, simple house. His father works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income, which is barely enough to cover all the family needs. Khaled is a first-year student in a local university where he studies English literature. Khaled would like to finish his studies and receive a BA degree so he can find a good job.
 
Khaled took has taken a Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him buy a new laptop for his studies. By taking this loan, Khaled will be able to do his homework and read articles online. 

Khaled appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his studies.

loans.name: Eman

texts.en: Eman is a conservative woman, so she asked her husband to take her place in the picture. Eman was born in 1989. She lives in a sector of Jordan called Marka with her husband and her son and daughter. For the past year, she has been supporting her husband and family financially by selling blankets. Now she needs to buy more blankets in order to raise her profits and sales so that she can cover her children's needs.  Because she doesn't have enough money to do so, Eman has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To buy more blankets for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her children's school fees, uniforms and books.

loans.name: Ester

texts.pt:
A Ester é casada maritalmente, vive com seu marido e seus dois filhos ambos do sexo feminino com idades compreendidas entre os 4 e 7 anos. Ela trabalha num café – bar como cozinheira É uma cliente da instituição a 2 anos, e com o valor do crédito a cliente pretende comprar 14 sacos de cimento e pagar o transporte do mesmo. 
O seu maior desafio do momento é concluir sua casa e seu maior sonho é terminar sua casa tipo 2 de material convencional na qual já se encontra a residir.
texts.en:
Ester is married and lives with her husband and two daughters who are 4 and 7 years old. She works in a coffee shop as a cook. 

Ester has been a client of the institution for 2 years and with this loan she plans to buy 14 sacks of cement and pay to transport it to her house.

Her biggest challenge at the moment is to finish building her house and her biggest dream is to be able to finish the house where she lives using conventional construction materials.

loans.use: buy 14 sacks of cement and pay to transport it to her house

loans.name: Ibtisam

texts.en:
Because Ibtisam is a conservative woman, she asked her brother to take her place in the picture. Ibtisam is a 41-year-old single lady. Her family has been known for making rugs for generations, but they used to make them by hand and at their houses.

Ibtisam has always helped her family since she was young, which gave her the experience to start a business and improve the process of making rugs. Six years ago she bought special machines for making rugs, which she sells in the market. Over these six years, Ibtisam was able to expand the business into a medium-sized workshop, employing people to support their families.

Ibtisam has applied for a loan to buy a new machine for making rugs in order to raise her productivity and sales. She is now taking special orders to make specific designs on the rugs using wool. Because she doesn't have enough money to purchase the machine, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To buy a new machine for making rugs

loans.name: Nour Eddin

texts.en:
Nour is a 22-year-old single man from Rafah city. He lives with his family in a small, simple house. His father works as an employee in a local firm sector where he gets a low income. This income barely covers all the family's needs. Nour is a final-year student at a local university, where he studies Mathematics. He would like to finish his studies and receive a BA degree, so he can find a good job.
 
Nour has taken a Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him buy a new laptop to use in his studies. By taking this loan, Nour will be able to do his homework and write reports more easily.

Nour appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his studies

loans.name: Kholoud

texts.en:
Kholoud is a 24-year-old single lady who lives with her parents and 7 siblings in a sector of Jordan called Mafraq. She is a third-year university student majoring in accounting. 

She is applying for an educational loan to help her pay her next semester's fees so she can start her career after graduation and help her family financially.

loans.use: to pay for her next semester's fees.

loans.name: Leonidas Antonio

texts.es: Leónidas es originario de la comunidad de peñas blancas aquí ha vivido toda su vida  dice que en la escuela de la comunidad  estudio toda su primaria, su vida ha sido un poco difícil ya que en el tiempo de guerra por temor hacer reclutado anduvo de comunidad en comunidad escondiéndose  fue una época bien difícil para muchos  que igual que  el tenían que huir. Después en los años 90 la historia fue otra así que él se dedicó a trabajar en siembra de maíz, frijoles  además de que aprendió el oficio de carpintero  así que hacia muebles y los vendía tiempo después con esfuerzos compro  una pequeña propiedad en la que cultiva café y siembra  granos básicos para el consumo del hogar  y su familia. En esta comunidad como en muchas otras aledañas no hay energía eléctrica en las viviendas lo que hacen es usar candiles para poder iluminarse unas cuantas horas por la noche, ahora que el mira la posibilidad de poder hacer un préstamo para comprar un sistema solar  su familia y él se sienten felices porque ven  que puede ser posible  que por fin tendrán luz en el hogar  ya que han vivido en la oscuridad por mucho tiempo.
texts.en:
Leónidas is from the Peñas Blancas community.  He has lived there his whole life.  He went to elementary school at the community school.  His life has been a little difficult.  Out of fear of being recruited during wartime, he went from community to community hiding himself.  It was a very difficult time for a lot of people, who, like him, had to flee.  

After the years in the 90’s, it was a different story.  He devoted himself to working by growing corn and beans.  He also learned the trade of carpentry.  He made furniture and later sold it.  With effort, he bought a small property on which he grows coffee.  He also grows basic grains for consumption by his household and his family.

In this community, like in many of the surrounding communities, there is no electricity in the houses.  What they do is use oil lamps in order to be able to have light for some hours at night.  He is now looking at the possibility of being able to get a loan to buy a solar system for his family.  They are happy because they see that it is finally possibly to have electricity in the household.  They have lived in the darkness for a long time.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for his household.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy toys for children and renovate her kindergarten.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers and put a fence around his farm

loans.name: Heidy

texts.es: Heidy  tiene la edad de 32  años, es casada y vive con el esposo y un  hijo actualmente. El crédito lo quiere para la compra de ganado  y cuando estén grandes venderlos y obtener una ganancia. El negocio del ganado le ayudará a ella y a su familia. Ella espera que con este proyecto crezca y logre sus objetivos y así pueda en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mejor estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Heidy is 32 years old, married, and lives with her husband and son. The loan she is seeking will be used to buy livestock. Then when the cows are grown, she will sell them for a profit. The livestock business will help both her and her family.

Heidy hopes that with this project she will achieve her goals and ensure that her family has a better standard of living and more financial stability. This is her first loan with FUDECOSUR. She has had no other loans with state banks beforehand, but FUDECOSUR is providing her with good terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: buy cattle

loans.name: Halima

texts.pt:
Sra. Halima é residente na Ponta de Ouro no bairro Zona Verde, casada maritalmente, com dois filhos de idades compreendidas entre 6 a10anos de idade. 
Conhece a Instituição ha bastante tempo e e cliente a longa data. Pretende um financiamento no valor de 80 mil mts para comprar uma viatura Toyota que ira impulsionar o seu negocio de compra e venda de roupa usada. 
Tem como seu maior sonho expandir o seu negócio, e tem como maior desafio adquirir uma camioneta para ajudar no seu negócio.
texts.en:
Mrs. Halima lives in Ponta de Ouro in the 'Zona Verde' (Green Zone) neighbourhood, is married and has two children aged 6 and 10.

She has known the Institution for quite a while and has been a client for a long time. She is looking for a 80,000 metical (MZN) loan to buy a Toyota vehicle which will provide a boost to her business of buying and selling used clothing.

Her biggest dream is to expand her business and her greatest challenge is to buy a van to help with her business.

loans.use: buy a Toyota vehicle which will provide a boost to her business of buying and selling used clothing.

loans.name: Jose Alfredo

texts.es: José Alfredo  tiene  25 años de edad es  habitante de la comunidad de peñas blancas  dice que el estudio hasta 2do año de secundaria  con ayuda de sus padres  después dejo de estudiar y se dedicó  a trabajar con su papa en las actividades del campo sembrando granos básicos y café, un tiempo después que apoyo a su padre y trabajo a su lado él le regalo 4 manzanas de tierra para que el las cultivara así que en ellas sembró café la que hoy en día le generan un ingreso lo que le permite  mantener a su esposa e hijo  pues ya tienen su propio hogar  cerca de la casa de sus padres a los que visita con frecuencia   y siempre ayuda a su papa a trabajar. Como en la comunidad no hay energía eléctrica él quiere este préstamo para comprar un  sistema solar para ser  instalado en su casa
texts.en:
José Alfredo, 25, lives in the community of Peñas Blancas.  He said he studied through the second year of secondary school with his parents' help.

When he left school he started working with his father in farming activities, helping him grow basic grains and coffee.  A while later, José Alfredo's father gave him four manzanas of land to cultivate, so he planted coffee.  Today this earns him an income that allows him to support his wife and child, because they have their own home near his parents' house.  He visits his parents frequently and always helps his father work.

There's no electricity in the community, so José Alfredo wants this loan to buy a solar energy system to install in his house.

loans.use: to buy a solar energy system

loans.name: Marta

texts.pt:
Marta é residente e natural da Ponta de Ouro, solteira e mãe de duas filhas com idades compreendidas de 9 a13 anos de idade, vive também com sua sobrinha de 2 anos de idade na sua responsabilidade.
Com o valor financiado pretende comprar os seguintes materiais: 4 aros de janelas, 60 litros de tinta, 3m de pedra, vários materiais eléctricos e pagar a mão-de-obra do pedreiro. 
O seu principal desafio e concluir a sua casa, e tem como sonho ter um restaurante para que possa confeccionar comidas e doces para seus clientes revelando assim seu talento na cozinha.
texts.en:
Marta is originally from and still lives in Ponta de Ouro, is single and the mother of two daughters aged 9 and 13. She also lives with her 2 year old niece who is her responsibility.

With this loan she plans to buy the following materials: 4 window frames, 60 litres of paint, 3m of stone, various electrical supplies and to pay for a stonemason.

Her main challenge is to finish building her house and her dream is to own a restaurant where she can make food and sweets for her customers, in this way revealing her talent for cooking.

loans.use: buy 4 window frames, 60 litres of paint, 3m of stone, various electrical supplies and to pay for a stonemason.

loans.name: Belmiiro

texts.pt:
O Sr. Belmiro é residente na Ponta de Ouro e tem casa própria, é Casado maritalmente e pai de 1 (uma) filha. Ele trabalha no centro de saúde da ponta de ouro como responsável da instituição.
Ele é cliente da Hluvuku há 6 (seis) anos e com o valor financiado o cliente pretende comprar 20 sacos de cimento, 15 barrotes 6 carradas de arreia, 6m de pedra, 20 ferros, 120 estribos, 75 chapas de zinco 14 pés, 9kg de arrame queimado e pagamento de mão-de-obra.
 Seu maior sonho é ver sua casa concluída e se formar como técnico superior.
texts.en:
Mr. Belmiro lives in Ponta de Ouro where he owns his own house, is married and has 1 (one) daughter. He works at the Ponta de Ouro health centre and is responsible for the centre.

He has been a client of Hluvuku's for 6 (six) years and with this loan he plans to buy 20 sacks of cements, 15 beams, 6 carloads of sand, 6m of stone, 20 pieces of iron, 120 boards, 75 sheets of zinc (14 feet each), 9kg of wiring and to pay for labour costs.

His biggest dream is to finish building his house and to formally train to be a senior technician.

loans.use: buy 20 sacks of cements, 15 beams, 6 carloads of sand, 6m of stone, 20 pieces of iron, 120 boards, 75 sheets of zinc (14 feet each), 9kg of wiring and to pay for labour costs.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, tiene la edad  de 62 años, está casada y vive con el esposo y un nieto. Ella pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de unos  cerdos y el alimento del mismo. Ella cuenta con varios cerdos   y lo que pretende es aumentar sus animales. Ella quiere tener sus animales con el peso ideal para su posterior venta en el mercado de la localidad o lugares aledaños. Ella quiere generar la mayor cantidad de ganancias para su bienestar  y la de su familia y crecer con el proyecto de engorde  de cerdos. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: María is 62 years old. She is married and lives with her husband and a grandson. With the loan, she intends to buy some pigs and some feed for them. She already has several pigs and she intends on increasing the number of animals she has. She wants to have her animals at the ideal weight to sell them in the local or in nearby markets. She wants to generate more profits for her and her family's well being, as well as to grow with the project of fattening up the pigs. This is the first loan she has received from FUDECOSUR. She has not had any other loans before from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered her the loan with better terms and a much lower rate of interest.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.pt:
Sra. Victoria é residente da Ponta Malongane, mãe de um filho com 8 anos de idade e casada maritalmente, vive ainda com duas sobrinhas na sua responsabilidade.
Conhece a Hluvuku-Adsema ha bastante tempo e vem a pedir o financiamento para reforçar o seu negócio. Com o presente valor pretende comprar seguintes produtos: 100 sacos de cimento, 10 sacos de arroz de 25kg, 20 sacos de arroz de 10kg e 20 sacos de arroz de 5kg.
Tem como maior desafio ampliar o seu negócio e ter uma camioneta. O seu maior sonho e fazer mais residências para aluguer e terminar a casa que ainda esta em construção
texts.en:
Mrs. Victoria lives in Ponta Malongane, is married and the mother of an 8 year old son. She also lives with two nieces who are her responsibility.

She has known of Hluvuku-Adsema for quite a long time and she has come to ask for a loan to reinforce her business. With this loan she plans to buy the following products: 100 sacks of cement, 10 25kg sacks of rice, 20 10kg sacks of rice and 20 5kg sacks of rice.

Her biggest challenge is to expand her business and buy a truck. Her greatest dream is to build more homes to rent out and finish building her own house which is still under construction.

loans.use: buy 100 sacks of cement, 10 25kg sacks of rice, 20 10kg sacks of rice and 20 5kg sacks of rice to reinforce her business

loans.name: Ugratara Group

texts.en:
Sridevi, aged 28, is the leader of a group that hails from Muniguda of Rayagada district of Odisha, India. She lives with her husband and has one son and one daughter, aged 5 and 9 respectively. The member standing in the middle with a raised hand is Sridevi. 

Sridevi is running a fancy store keeping ladies items, particularly bags and shoes, with the support of her husband in her locality. Sridevi, along with four other members of her village, formed a group and want to take a loan for the fifth time from Mahashakti Foundation for development of their existing businesses. 
 
Before availing the loan, her sales were not sufficient to meet her daily requirements. She was earning about Rs. 9,000 per month from her business, which is not sufficient enough to maintain her family. Now she is very much confident in running her business. She has a desire to be a wholesaler of bags of different quality and designs. With the loan, she wants to purchase bags and shoes.

The other four members are named Laxmi, Rajlaxmi, Lachmi and Ijiya. They have businesses of a grocery shop, dry foods business, fancy store, and readymade garments shop.

loans.use: to purchase bags and shoes.

loans.name: Michael

texts.es: Michael, un hombre emprendedor , tiene 24 años de edad, es soltero y vive con su madre y dos hermanos  actualmente, el solicito un préstamo con el anhelo de  comprar una máquina para hacer bordados a la ropa, el junto con su madre se dedica a dicha actividad , el pretende con esto poder tener más trabajo y mejores ingresos , la única delimitación que este caballero tiene es la falta de dinero  para continuar creciendo, ya que de esta actividad económica dependen para poder salir adelante, por lo que él hace una solicitud  de  crédito , y es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no registra otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja……
texts.en: Michael is an enterprising man.  He is 24 years old, single, and lives with his mother and two siblings.  He is asking for this loan to buy an embroidery machine, since he and his mother do this.  He hopes to have a better income this way.  The only problem this gentleman has is a lack of capital with which to continue growing and they depend on this activity to get ahead, so he is asking for this loan.  This will be his first loan through FUDECOSUR.  He has not had other loans through state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided him a loan with greater ease and at a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy an embroidery machine.

loans.name: Rocio

texts.es: Roció  tiene  35  años de edad, esta casada y vive con el esposo y una hija y un nieto actualmente. Ella con el crédito pretende comprar ropa al por mayor. Ella piensa aumentar su inventario de mercadería y así  poder generar más ganancias para contribuir con su familia, ella no cuenta con el capital necesario para dicha compra, ya que es de bajos recursos y no tiene como adquirir el dinero necesario para esto, por lo que el solicito un crédito, y es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja…
texts.en: Rocio is 35 years old, married, and lives with her husband, daughter, and a grandson.  She will use the money from this loan to buy clothing in quantity and wants to increase her inventory of merchandise.  This will allow her to generate more income for the family.  She doesn’t have the necessary capital for this, so she is asking for this loan.  This will be her first loan through FUDECOSUR.  She has not had other loans through state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided her a loan with greater ease and at a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Letty María

texts.es:
En la pila de Montecristi se reúne cada quince días el Grupo De Crédito  Para el Futuro De la Mujer. Este lugar es muy conocido por su rica cultura tradicional, donde se puede encontrar una gran variedad de  artesanía elaboradas por sus habitantes.
En este lugar vive la señora Letty, tiene 30 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 6  años de edad y de 4 meses de nacido,  el mayor estudia en escuela. Su esposo es comerciante.
Doña Letty junto a su esposo  se dedica al a compra y venta de  de adornos hechos en tagua y cerámicas,  tienen un  local en la vía principal  de la ciudad,  trabajan todos los días desde las 8h00 hasta las 17h00, ellos compran las artesanías a artesanos de la zona pero sin pintar y ellos les dan el acabado. Llevan más de  10 años que se dedican a esta actividad con la cual salen adelante. 
Ella está repitiendo el crédito ya que es así como ellos  se financian su negocio, las ganancias le sirvieron para pagar gastos de su parto y para comprar ropa que le hacía falta para el recién nacido. Este crédito es para comprar más artesanía de todas las formas y modelos y pinturas para darles el terminado a sus objetos. Lleva más de 5 años en el Grupo De Crédito  y le gusta porque los créditos le ayudan mucho. Su sueño es darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The "Para el Futuro De la Mujer" communal bank meets in La Pila, Montecristi. This place is known for it's rich traditional culture where you can find a great variety of handicrafts made by it's inhabitants. 

Letty lives here. She is 30 years old and is in a common-law relationship. From this relationship she has two children, one 6 years old who studies in Primary school and one four month old baby. Her husband is a businessman. Letty together with her husband works buying and selling decorations made out of  tagua (wood) and ceramics. They have a shop on the main street of the city. They work every day from 8 am until 5 pm. They buy the handicrafts from local craftspeople, but unfinished and they finish them. They have been in this business for more than 10 years, an activity which keeps them going. 

Letty is getting another loan as this is how they finance the business. The profits go to pay their expenses and to buy clothing for their new-born baby. She will use the loan to buy more handicrafts of all types and models and paint them to finish them. Letty has been in the communal bank for more than 5 years and likes it because the loans help them so much. Her dream is to provide the best for her children.

loans.use: To buy crafts and paint.

loans.name: Durpati Group

texts.en:
Subashini, aged about 38 years, is the group leader of a five-member group of Muniguda town, situated in the district of Rayagada, Odisha, India. She is running a grocery shop and a tailoring unit. Her family is composed of four members: her husband and two sons, aged 18 and 15. The member standing second from left with a raised hand is Subashini. 

She has a kirana shop (small local shop), and her husband has been running this business for the last eleven years. She is running the tailoring unit in her house. At present, her family income is about Rs. 8,500 per month, which is not sufficient to manage her family and to keep pace with the present society. Last year, Subashini took a secondhand auto for her son by getting a loan from Mahashakti.

To improve her living condition and to earn some extra income, she wants to avail a loan. From the loan, she will add some grocery items like rice, pulses, wheat, sugar, tea, potatoes, onions, garlic, washing powder, etc. to her shop. 

She has a dream to expand her business and wants to be a wholesaler of grocery items in her small town by maintaining a variety of items.

The other four members are Padma, Khiramati, Puri and Muthek. They also want loans, for a fancy shop, paddy business, mixture business and fast food stall respectively.

loans.use: to purchase rice, pulses, wheat, sugar, tea, potatoes, onions, garlic, washing powder, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in savoury and sweet breads.

loans.name: Diana Maricela

texts.es:
En la pila de Montecristi se reúne cada quince días el Grupo De Crédito  Para el Futuro De la Mujer. Este lugar es muy conocido por su rica cultura tradicional, donde se puede encontrar una gran variedad de  artesanía elaboradas por sus habitantes.
En este lugar vive la señora Diana, tiene 21 años  de edad, está casada pero aun no tienen hijos. Ella estudia párvulo en una universidad de Manta. 
Doña Diana parar financiar sus estudios tiene un negocio en su casa que comenzó  con la ayuda de los créditos, allí vende sodas, aguas, jugos entre otras cosas, así ella logra ganar algo por su cuenta y seguir sus estudios pensando en el futuro.
Ella está repitiendo el crédito para seguir incrementando su negocio, va a comprar aguas, jugos y sodas. Lleva 2 años en el Grupo De Crédito  y le gustan los créditos ya que estos le  ayudan a financiar su negocio. Sus sueños son terminar sus estudios y tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
The "Para El Futuro de la Mujer" loan group meets every fortnight in Montecristi, a place known for its rich, traditional culture. Here you can find all sorts of artisan products created by the locals.

And it is here that 21-year-old Diana lives. She is married but does not have any children yet. Diana is studying primary education at a university in Manta.

In order to finance her studies Diana has a business that she runs out of her home and which she started with the help of loans. Diana sells fizzy drinks, water, juices and other items. With this work she is able to earn a little on her own and to continue with her studies while also thinking of the future.

Diana is applying for another loan in order to continue expanding her business. She will use it to buy water, juices and fizzy drinks. Diana has been with the loan group for two years and she likes receiving the loans as they help her to finance her business. Diana's dream is to finish her studies and to own her own house.

loans.use: to buy water, juice and fizzy drinks.

loans.name: Mariana De Jesús

texts.es:
En la pila de Montecristi se reúne cada quince días el Grupo De Crédito  Para el Futuro De la Mujer. Este lugar es muy conocido por su rica cultura tradicional, donde se puede encontrar una gran variedad de  artesanía elaboradas por sus habitantes.
En este lugar vive la señora Mariana, tiene 39 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos de 24, 19, 10 y 8 años, las dos mayores ya están comprometidas y los menores estudian en escuela y son los que aun viven con ella. Su esposo es empleado público.
Doña Mariana para poder solventar  algunos gastos del hogar se dedica al comercio,  compra y vende  de adornos y cerámicas,  tiene un  local en la vía principal lugar por donde pasan muchas personas, sus hijos le ayudan en sus ventas y en el acabado de las cerámicas ya que las compran a artesanos de la zona pero sin pinta y luego ella le dan el terminado adecuado para venderlos. Lleva 16 años que se dedica a esta actividad y que le ha ido muy bien. 
Este crédito es para comprar más artesanía de todas las formas y modelos y pinturas para darles el terminado a sus objetos. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito  y le gusta porque con uno de los créditos empezó su negocio. Su sueño es darles lo mejor a sus hijos
texts.en:
The "Para El Futuro de la Mujer" loan group meets every fortnight in Montecristi, a place known for its rich, traditional culture. Here you can find all sorts of artisan products created by the locals.

And it is here that 39-year-old Mariana lives. She is married and has four children - aged 24, 19, 10 and 8 years old each - with her husband. The two eldest children are engaged while the youngest two are attending school and still live at home. Mariana's husband works for the state.

In order to cover some household costs, Mariana has a business: she buys and sells decorations and ceramic goods. She has a shop on the main street, which has many passers-by. Mariana's children help out with sales. They also help put the finishing touches to the ceramics as Mariana buys them from local artisans but not yet painted. Mariana and her children put the final touches to the goods before selling them. Mariana has been doing this work for 16 years and it has gone very well for her.

This loan will be used to buy more artisan goods of all shapes and designs, and to buy paint to finish off the products. Mariana has been with the loan group since the beginning and she likes it because one of the loans allowed her to start her business. Mariana's dream is to give her children the best she can to her children.

loans.use: to buy artisan goods and paints.

loans.name: Leidy Tatiana

texts.es:
Ella es Leidy Tatiana, esta estudiando Técnico Laboral auxiliar en enfermería en campo alto, tiene 18 años próximamente va a cumplir 19 años, vive en un apartamento pequeño con la mama, el papa, la hermana  menor que tiene diez años y el hermano mayor, pasa al tercer semestre que son las practicas, en campo alto ha aprendido muchas cosas. Como lo demostró al canalizar, tomar muestras de sangre a una persona, Atender y orientar a las personas en relación con las necesidades y expectativas de acuerdo con las instituciones y normas vigentes, Administrar medicamentos según delegación y de acuerdo con técnicas establecidas en relación con los principios éticos y legales vigentes, hacer sondas, Generar actitudes y prácticas saludables en los ambientes de trabajo, Brindar atención integral al individuo y la familia en relación al ciclo vital de acuerdo con el contexto social, político, cultural y ético. 
Es una excelente  carrera ya que con estos conocimientos puede ayudar a las demás personas que lo necesitan y le gustaría seguir  estudiando ya que es la carrera que le gusta demasiado.
Hace un año y dos meses término el bachillerato en el colegio de educación técnica y académica celestin freinet. 

cuando salió del colegio quiso seguir estudiando y lo está logrando, ella quería estudiar en una universalidad pero era muy costosa, luego miro otras opciones y en campo alto le parecía excelente estudiar, ya que  le queda  cerca de la casa y se podía ir en bicicleta y pues no es tan costoso como la universidad, pero aun así le queda un poco apretado ya que empieza prácticas este semestre  y  los padres no le pueden ayudar a pagar los estudios  porque tiene que ayudarle a la hermanita menor ella está en grado quinto, el mercado, los recibos, y todos los gastos del apartamento son altos, y pues este semestre tiene que comprar uniforme, conseguir para los trasportes y los materiales que se necesite y que le pidan en el hospital. 
Los padres no gana mucho dinero, ellos se ganan solo el mínimo. En estos momentos  está desempleada y no la reciben en ninguna empresa porque no tiene experiencia o no le sirve los  horarios porque la prioridad  es estudiar y salir adelante con la carrera y así cumplir con el proyecto de vida o las metas que tiene programadas para el futuro, porque después de terminar esta carrera piensa hacer  otra,  pero con ayuda de esta carrera que está haciendo en estos momentos quiere poder  pagarse la otra,  por este motivo necesita el subsidio que ofrece kiva ella lo agradecería de todo corazón si le pueden ayudar.
texts.en:
Leidy Tatiana is studying for a technical degree as a nursing assistant at Campo Alto.  She is 18 years old and will soon turn 19.  She lives in a small apartment with her mother, father, 10 year old younger sister, and her older brother.  She is in her third semester, where she does her practical work.  She has learned a lot at Campo Alto.  She has learned to take blood samples, to care for and orient people in relation to their needs and expectations from the institutions and current norms, to administer medicines as instructed and in agreement with established techniques and ethical and legal norms, to insert tubes, to generate healthy attitudes and practices at work, and to provide comprehensive care to individuals and families at all parts of the life cycle while understanding the social, political, cultural, and ethical context.  

This is an excellent career since this knowledge can help other people who need it.  She would like to continue studying since this is what she likes the most.  She finished high school a year and two months ago at the technical education high school and Celestin Freinet academy.  When she finished high school, she wanted to continue studying, and she has achieved that.  She wanted to study at the university, but it is very expensive, so she looked into other options. Campo Alto seemed like an excellent option since it was close to her home and she could travel by bicycle, and it was not as expensive as the university.  However, she was a little short of money since she started practicals this semester and her parents were not able to help pay for her studies.  They have to help her younger sister who is in fifth grade, the market, the bills, and all of the apartment costs are high, and this semester she has to buy uniforms and get the transportation and materials that the hospital requires.  Her parents only make the minimum amount of money.  

She is currently unemployed and could not work at any business because she has no experience and the schedule would not work because studying is her priority.  She wants to succeed in her career so that she can achieve the goals she has planned for the future.  After finishing this degree, she is thinking about doing another.  With the help of the degree she is completing now, she can pay for the other.  For this reason, she needs a loan from Kiva.  She would be grateful with all of her heart if you could help her.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of school.

loans.name: Delia

texts.es: La señora Delia vive en el municipio de Colomi de 27 años de edad, de estado civil soltera, económicamente es independiente, percibe ingresos economicos de la actividad de comercio, compra papa los días jueves y domingo de los productores de Colomi y vende los días miércoles y sábado en la feria de la ciudad de Cochabamba, tiene una experiencia de más de 6 años como comerciante. Actualmente requiere un crédito para capital de operación ya que quiere comprar más carga de papa para incrementar su ventas y así poder ofrecer más productos dentro del mercado ya que tiene bastante demanda, de esta forma lograra mejorar sus ingresos económicos a futuro y las condiciones en las que se encuentra.
texts.en:
Delia lives in the municipality of Colomi.  She is 27 years old, single and economically independent. She makes her money in business, buying potatoes on Thursdays from the producers in Colomi and selling on Saturdays and Wednesdays in the market in the city of Cochabamba. She has more than 6 years of experience as a businesswoman. 

At present she needs a loan as working capital as she wants to buy another load of potatoes. She can increase her sales and offer more products at the market. There is a lot of demand and she can increase her economic revenues in the future and also the conditions in which she lives.

loans.use: to have more working capital (purchase a large amount of potatoes to increase her sales)

loans.name: Gangotree Group

texts.en:
Nupura, aged 38 years, is the leader of a group that hails from Muniguda of Rayagada district of Odisha, India. She lives with her husband and three sons, aged about 17, 14 and 12 respectively. The member standing second from left with a raised hand is Nupura. 

Nupura is selling groundnuts (both raw and fried) in a nearby market with the support of her husband. In 2010, Nupura, along with three other members of her village, formed a group and took a loan from Mahashakti Foundation for development of their existing businesses. This is the third-cycle loan.  

At the time of availing her first loan, Nupura’s sales were not sufficient to meet her daily requirements. Out of their small income, they are maintaining their family in a very pitiable condition. Now she is very much confident in running her business and has developed her business significantly. Her husband is also doing the seasonal business. At present, her family's monthly income is about Rs. 8,000. 

She wants to take a further loan to purchase groundnuts, leaves (suitable for making leaf plates) and paddy. She has a desire to open a seasonal shop.

The other three members of the group are named Bilasha, Durmati and Golapi. They want loans for a seasonal business, leaf plate-making and selling, and a fancy shop respectively.

loans.use: to purchase groundnuts, leaves (suitable for making leaf plates) and paddy.

loans.name: Elba Lucila

texts.es:
En la pila de Montecristi se reúne cada quince días el Grupo De Crédito  Para el Futuro De la Mujer. Este lugar es muy conocido por su rica cultura tradicional, donde se puede encontrar una gran variedad de  artesanía elaboradas por sus habitantes.
En este lugar vive la señora Elba, tiene 48 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos, tres de ellos ya son mayores de edad y la menor tiene  11 años, estudia en la escuela y  es la única que  viven con ella. Su esposo es artesano.
Doña Elba y su esposo tienen un taller de artesanía, allí ellos fabrican  todo tipo de figuras las mismas que elaboran  en barro o en cerámica, trabajan todos los días ya que la demanda de sus productos es muy grande, ellos entregan sus productos semiterminados y acabados a comerciantes de su localidad y de otras ciudades, sus obras son muy apreciadas en muchos lugares del país y fuera de él. Llevan más de 20 años dedicadas a esta labor y les ha ido muy bien.
Este crédito es para comprar cerámica para elaborar sus productos. Lleva 10 años en el Grupo De Crédito  y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan en el grupo. Su sueño es darle lo mejor a su pequeña.
texts.en:
The "Para el Futuro De la Mujer" communal bank meets every fortnight in La Pila, Montecristi. This place is known for it's rich traditional culture and the handicrafts produced by it's inhabitants. 

Elba lives here. She is 48 years old, married and from this relationship has 4 children. Three of them are adults and the youngest is 11 years old and studies in school. She is the only one that lives with them. Her husband is a craftsman. Together they have a craft shop where they make all kinds of figures themselves made out of clay or ceramics. They work every day as the demand for their product is high. They sell their product semi-finished or finished to merchants of their community or other cities. Their work is much appreciated in many parts of the country and outside of Ecuador. They have been doing this for more than 20 years and things are going well for them. 

This loan is to buy clay to make their products. Elba has been a member of her communal bank for 10 years and likes it for the support given in the group. Her dream is to give the best to her youngest child.

loans.use: to buy ceramics.

loans.name: Sai Bhagaban Group

texts.en:
Debaki is the leader of a group that hails from Muniguda, Rayagada district of Odisha, India. She is a married woman of 30 years of age, having two daughters, aged 9 and 12 years. The member seated second from the left with a raised hand is Debaki. 

Debaki is doing a readymade clothes business in her locality. Her husband was helping her in this business. In the year 2010, Debaki, along with three other members of her village, formed a group and took a loan from Mahashakti Foundation for expansion of their existing businesses. 

At the time of availing her first loan, she was earning a sum of Rs. 3,000 per month. Thereafter, her income grew rapidly, commensurate with her business turnover. Out of their small income, they are maintaining their family in a low profile. To improve her living condition and to earn some extra income, she availed a second loan. Now she is very much confident in running her business and has developed her business significantly. 

At present, her family’s monthly income is about Rs. 5,000, but it is not sufficient to cater to the needs of her family. She has a dream to have an established readymade shop in the future. 

From this loan, Debaki wants to purchase readymade dresses for trading. 

The three other members are named Rukuni, Kuni and Purnabati. They also want loans, for a mixture business, dry foods business, and sweet and snacks shop respectively.

loans.use: to purchase readymade dresses for trading.

loans.name: Eulogia Agripina

texts.es:
En la pila de Montecristi se reúne cada quince días el Grupo De Crédito  Para el Futuro De la Mujer. Este lugar es muy conocido por su rica cultura tradicional, donde se puede encontrar una gran variedad de  artesanía elaboradas por sus habitantes.
En este lugar vive la señora Eulogia, tiene 81 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen 8 hijos mayores  de edad e independientes. Su esposo es comerciante. 
Doña Eulogia y su esposo tienen una tienda de abarrotes en su casa en la cual además de vender productos de primera necesidad también venden legumbres, carne, pescado, ciertos artículos de bazar, útiles escolares, helados entre otras cosas, trabajan todos los días desde las 6h30 hasta las 20h00, su tienda es una de las primeras que hay en ese lugar y se ha mantenido hasta el momento y con ella pudieron sacar adelante a sus hijos ya que su tienda tiene más de 50 años.
Este crédito es para comprar víveres y útiles escoles.. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito  y le gusta porque siempre los créditos le han ayudado mucho. Su sueño es tener salud para seguir adelante.
texts.en:
In La Pila, in Montecristi, the credit group "Para el Futuro De la Mujer" ["For the Future of Women"] meets every two weeks. This place is well-known for its rich traditional culture, and its inhabitants make a great variety of handicrafts.

In this place lives Eulogia, who is 81 years old. She is married, and from this relationship she has 8 children who are now grown and independent. Her husband is a merchant. 

Eulogia and her husband have a grocery store in their home. There, in addition to selling basic household necessities, they also sell vegetables, meat, fish, some general merchandise, school supplies, and ice cream, among other things. They work every day from 6:30 a.m. until 8 p.m. Their store was one of the first in their area, and it has continued until now. With it, they were able to raise their children, since the store is now more than 50 years old.

This loan is to buy groceries and school supplies. Eulogia has been in the communal bank from the beginning, and she likes it because the loans have always been of great help to her. Her dream is to be healthy enough to keep moving forward.

loans.use: to buy groceries and school supplies to sell in her store.

loans.name: Rubí Asuncion Del Carmen

texts.es:
En el sitio el Limón del cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Grupo De Crédito Madres Alegres. En este lugar la mayoría de las personas se dedican a la agricultura, los deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños son reconocidos en todo el país.
En este lugar vive la señora Rubí, tiene 47 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos mayores de edad e independientes. Su esposo es maestro. 
Doña Rubí hace varios años atrás aprendió corte y confección en una academia en la localidad y hoy con la finalidad de obtener sus propios ingresos y aprovechando sus conocimientos en corte y confección puso un pequeño taller de costura en la casa de su mamá,  confeccionar todo tipo de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños,  trabaja a base de pedidos de personas particulares, ella también en su casa se dedica a la cría de pollos y gallinas criollas las mismas que al venderlas le dejan muy buenos ingresos que le sirven para salir adelante.
Este nuevo crédito lo va utilizar en comprar alimento para pollos, telas y otros materiales para la costura. Esta desde el inicio en el grupo de crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan los créditos. Su sueño es tener un taller más grande.
texts.en:
The Madres Alegres lending group meets every two weeks in the Rocafuerte settlement of the city of Limon.  Here, most of the people are farmers and the locals are known nationwide for the delicious candies they prepare. 

Rubi lives here.  She is 47 years old, married, and has three adult children on their own.  Her husband is a teacher.

Rubi learned to make clothing at a local school a few years ago.  She set up her own workshop at her mother’s house with the aim of generating her own income and taking advantage of her knowledge of clothing manufacture.  She makes all sorts of clothing for men, women, and children and takes orders from customers.  She also raises and sells chickens, which provides a very good income so that she can get ahead.

She will use the money from this loan to buy chicken feed, fabric and sewing supplies.  She has been with the lending group from the beginning and she likes it because of the help with the loans.  Her dream is to have a larger workshop.

loans.use: to buy chicken feed and fabric.

loans.name: Djiparkhan

texts.ru: Джипархан 44 года, не замужем, одна воспитывает сына. У Джипархан - среднее образование,в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Джипархан занимается полеводством и животноводством, стартовав 10 лет назад, с 20,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Джипархан, на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 4 овцы, также имеется 1,04 ГА земельной доли, на которой ежегодно выращивает картофель, перец, помидоры, огурцы, лук для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Дополнительно к этому Джипархан занимается выпечкой хлеба на дому, реализует в местные продовольственные магазины. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Джипархан обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом на покупку семян овощей для посевных работ и удобрений для обработки земли. Доходы от кредита Джипархан планирует вложить в приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на строительство небольшого павильона по продаже хлебобулочных изделий.
texts.en: Djiparkhan is 44 years old, unmarried, and is raising a son by herself.  Djiparkhan has a secondary education.  Djiparkhan's work in farming and animal husbandry, which began 10 years ago with 20,000 KGS, is the main source of income for her family.  Thanks to Djiparkhan's hard work, she now has 1 milk cow, 4 sheep, and also 1.04 hectares of land, on which she raises potatoes, peppers, tomatoes, cucumbers, and onions for consumption and for sale.  In addition to this, Djiparkhan bakes bread, which she sells in local grocery stores.  Her monthly income is 10,000 KGS.  With the goal of furthering her business, Djiparkhan turned to the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan to purchase vegetable seeds for planting and fertilizer for soil cultivation.  With the income she earns from her loan, Djiparkhan plans to save toward increasing the number of cattle she has, and also plans to save towards construction of a small pavilion where she can sell baked goods.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Verónica Elizabeth

texts.es:
En el sitio el Limón del cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Grupo De Crédito Madres Alegres. En este lugar la mayoría de las personas se dedican a la agricultura, los deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños son reconocidos en todo el país.
En este lugar conocimos a la señora Verónica, tiene 30 años de edad, es madre soltera de un  hijo de 11 años que estudian en escuela. Ella vive sola con su hijo.
Doña Verónica es una mujer muy luchadora que le gusta a base de esfuerzo ganar lo suyo para sacar adelante a su hijo, ella se dedica a varias actividades, vende ropa, realiza recargas telefónicas en su casa, pero su negocio principal es el de elaborar productos químicos para limpieza, para esto ella tiene un pequeño local en el cual prepara estas mezclas con la ayuda de su tío el cual es socio en este negocio y reparten las ganancias en partes iguales, son tres años que lleva con este negocio el cual le permite sacar adelante  a su hijo.
Este nuevo crédito lo va utilizar en comprar ropa y productos  químicos. Lleva 5 años en el grupo de crédito y le gusta porque con  los créditos mejora su negocio. Su sueño es darle lo mejor a su hijo.
texts.en:
The Madres Alegres lending group meets every two weeks in the Rocafuerte settlement of the city of Limon.  Here, most of the people are farmers and the locals are known nationwide for the delicious candies they prepare.

Here we meet Veronica.  She is 30 years old and is the single mother of an 11 year old boy who attends school  She and her son live alone.

Veronica is a hardworking woman who likes to earn through her efforts and get her son ahead.  She does a number of things; sells clothing, cell phone minutes from her home, but her main business is making cleaning supplies.  She has a small shop where she prepares these mixtures with her uncle’s help, who is a business partner, and they split the profits evenly.  She has had this business for three years and this allows her to get her son ahead.

She will use the money from this new loan to buy clothing and chemicals.  She has been with the group for three years and she likes it because the loans help her improve her business.  Her goal is to provide the best for her son.

loans.use: to buy clothing and chemicals.

loans.name: Ozodakhon

texts.ru: Озодахон 30 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. Дети школьного и дошкольного возраста. Супруг помогает ей по хозяйству. У Озодахон - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Озодахон занимается полеводством, стартовав 8 лет назад, с 25,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Озодахон, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: земельный надел размером 0,65 ГА, на которой выращивает картофель, репу, помидоры, кукурузу. В огороде жилого дома построены 2 теплицы, где круглый год выращивают зелень, редиску и огурцы. В настоящее время в хозяйстве не имеется скота, но имеются все условия для содержания скота, имеется сарай с навесом для скота, сено заготовлено в достаточном количестве. Ежемесячный доход составляет 12,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Озодахон обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом - на покупку бычков для откорма с последующей реализацией на рынке по высокой цене. Доходы от кредита Озодахон планирует вложить в улучшение жилищных условий, и намерена собрать средства на строительство новой современной теплицы.
texts.en: Ozodakhon is 30 years old, married, and, together with her spouse, is raising 3 children, who are school and preschool-aged.  Her spouse helps her around the house.  Ozodakhon has a secondary education.  Ozodakhon's work in farming, which began 8 years ago with 25,000 KGS, is the main source of income for her family.  Thanks to Ozodakhon's hard work, she now has a plot of land that is 0.65 hectares, on which she raises potatoes, turnips, tomatoes, and corn.  In the garden of her home are two greenhouses, in which she grows greens, radishes, and cucumbers year-round.  As of now she does not own cattle, but she has everything necessary to raise cattle, including a barn with a cattle shed, and sufficient hay.  Her monthly income is 12,000 KGS.  With the goal of furthering her business, Ozodakhon turned to the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan to purchase steers to fatten and resell at the market for a higher price.  With the income from the loan Ozodakhon plans to improve her living conditions, and also to save toward building new, modern greenhouses.

loans.use: to buy steers for fattening and resale

loans.name: Eugenia Audilia

texts.es: Eugenia Audilia mayor de edad soltera con tres hijos mayores de edad, originaria del municipio de chinandega ubicad en el occidente del país, Eugenia se caracteriza por ser una mujer luchadora con muchos de seos de superación personal, es propietaria de una pulperia ubicada en su casa de habitación el cual ofrece productos de consumo de abarroteria como: aceite, frijoles, azúcar, arroz, productos congelados,gaseosas golosinas, medicamentos, cosméticos, shampoo entre otros mas, inicia su negocio con fondos propios, sus compras las realiza al contado en distribuidoras y camiones proveedores del municipio, tiene clientes fijos y eventuales, los cuales da al contado y al crédito recuperando semanal, Eugenia desde muy temprano habré las puertas de su negocio para brindarles un mejor servicio a sus clientes, el objetivo de este crédito es para invertir en su pulperia en la compra de productos congelados, arroz, azúcar, detergentes, frijoles, entre otros.-
texts.en: Eugenia Audilia is a single adult with three adult children. She is from the municipality of Chinandega, located in the western part of the country. Eugenia is known for being a hard-working woman with a great desire to get ahead in life. She is the proprietor of a neighborhood store located in the house where she lives. In her store, she sells grocery products such as cooking oil, beans, rice, frozen foods, soft drinks, snacks, medications, cosmetics, and shampoo, among other items. She started her business with her own funds. She makes her purchases in cash from distributors and supply trucks in the municipality. She has both steady and occasional customers, who pay in cash and on credit. In the case of the credit customers, she collects payments each week. Eugenia opens the doors of her business very early in the morning in order to provide better service to her customers. The aim of this loan is to invest in her neighborhood store by purchasing frozen foods, rice, sugar, detergents, beans, and other products.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store, such as rice, beans, cooking oil, frozen foods and other items.

loans.name: Rahbar

texts.ru:
Ее зовут Рахбар. Она милая, добрая, отзывчивая и активная женщина. Рахбар вырастила троих детей, и поставили их на ноги. Ее муж работает на телевидении охранником, а сын уехал заграницу на заработки. Она с мужем, невесткой и внуком живет в городке Хучанд. Имя Рахбар обозначает руководитель, предводитель. Она 20 лет работала преподавателем в школе. Она любит детей и всегда оказывает им помощь в трудную минуту. Сейчас она большое внимание уделяет воспитанию внука. 
  Рахбар параллельно с работой в школе шила платья. 25 лет своей жизни Рахбар посвятила кройке и шитью. Ей нравится проводить время рядом со швейной машинкой. Рахбар любит шить новые и новые платья разной модели и типа. У Рахбара старая машинка и она решила купить новую машинку, чтобы ее работа завершилась скорее, чтоб она быстрее могла приступить к новому платью и качество работы на новой швейной машинке улучшиться. Но для покупки машинки у нее не хватает денег. Поэтому она просит Вас помочь ей.
texts.en: This is Rahbar.  She is a cute, kind, sympathetic, and active woman.  Rahbar raised three children and set them on their own two feet.  Her husband works as a television security guard, and her son went abroad for work.  She and her husband, daughter-in-law, and grandson live in the city of Khujand.  The name "Rahbar" means "head" or "leader."  She worked for 20 years as a teacher in school - she loves children and always provides them with help in their difficult moments.  Now she pays special attention to raising her grandson.  Rahbar, in addition to working at the school, also sews dresses.  Rahbar dedicated 25 years of her life to sewing and tailoring.  She likes to spend her time around her sewing machine - Rahbar loves to sew new dresses and new styles and types of dresses.  Rahbar has an old sewing machine and decided to purchase a new one so that she could complete her work sooner, begin new dresses quicker, and improve the quality of her work.  She does not, however, have enough money to purchase a new sewing machine, and is therefore asking you to help her.

loans.use: to purchase a new, computerized sewing machine

loans.name: Maricela Ivonne

texts.es:
En la pila de Montecristi se reúne cada quince días el Grupo De Crédito  Para el Futuro De la Mujer. Este lugar es muy conocido por su rica cultura tradicional, donde se puede encontrar una gran variedad de  artesanía elaboradas por sus habitantes.
En este lugar vive la señora Maricela, tiene 24  años de edad y es madre soltera de una hija de 1 año. Ella vive en casa de sus padres. Lleva 4 ciclos en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le dan la oportunidad de  salir adelante.
Doña Maricela es una joven madre que siempre le ha gustado ganar lo suyo a base de trabajo y con esto sacar adelante a su pequeña, ella se dedica a la elaboración de adornos y cerámicas,  tiene un  pequeño taller en casa de unos familiares en el cual le da distintas formas al barro y a las cerámicas, trabaja todos los días ya que tiene que entregar a muchos comerciantes locales y de otras ciudades,  gracias a esta actividad ella sale adelante, ya son 4 años dedicada a esto lo cual lo aprendió de sus padres. 
Este crédito es para comprar cerámica y barro para elaborar las obras. Su sueño es darle lo mejor a su pequeña.
texts.en:
In La Pila, in Montecristi, the communal bank "Para el Futuro De la Mujer" ["For the Future of Women"] meets every two weeks. This place is very well-known for its rich traditional culture. Its inhabitants make a great variety of handicrafts. 

In this place lives Maricela, who is 24 years old and the single mother of a 1-year-old daughter. She lives in her parents' house. She has been with the communal bank for four loan cycles, and she likes it because the loans give her the opportunity to get ahead. 

Maricela is a young mother who has always liked earning what she needs through work, and in this way she is supporting her little child. She works making decorations and ceramic items. She has a small workshop in the house of some family members, where she forms the clay and ceramics into different designs. She works every day, since she has to deliver her products to many local merchants and those from other cities. Thanks to this work, she is getting ahead. She has dedicated herself to this for four years, and she learned it from her parents. 
 
This loan is to buy ceramics and clay to make her handicrafts. Her dream is to give her little daughter all the best.

loans.use: to buy ceramics and clay.

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.es:
Reynaldo de 49 años de edad, soltero con un hijo bajo su responsabilidad, es originario del Sauce, lugar que está  ubicado en la zona norte de la región. El se caracteriza por ser trabajador, responsable, con ganas de superación personal. A pesar de que ha sido un padre solo ha podido cumplir sus sueños con su hijo, y está  a punto de lograrlo como es formarlo en un profesional. 

Gracia a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante  tiene por actividad económica una pulpería, es una pequeña tienda que vende productos comestibles en cantidades pequeñas como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, pan, huevos, queso, fósforos, jugos, gaseosas. El dedica a su negocio unas 12 horas diarias ofreciendo sus productos. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio, para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos.  Reynaldo agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es  Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Reynaldo is 49 years old and single, with a son under his responsibility. He originally came from Sauce in the northern zone of the region. Reynaldo is hard-working, responsible, and has the desire for personal advancement. 

Thanks to his efforts and desire to get ahead, Reynaldo's economic activity consists of a general store. It is small and sells grocery products in small quantities, including rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, eggs, cheese, matches, juice, and soft drinks.

Reynaldo spends some 12 hours a day selling his products. The objective of this loan is to invest in his working capital to resupply his business, so that in the not very distant future, he will be able to obtain better income.

Reynaldo is grateful for Kiva investors who offer people of scarce resources in poor countries like Nicaragua a means of dignified work.

loans.use: to invest in re-stocking his business with grocery products such as rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, eggs, cheese, matches, juice, and soft drinks.

loans.name: Cecilia Lorena

texts.es:
En la pila de Montecristi se reúne cada quince días el Grupo De Crédito  Para el Futuro De la Mujer. Este lugar es muy conocido por su rica cultura tradicional, donde se puede encontrar una gran variedad de  artesanía elaboradas por sus habitantes.
En este lugar vive la señora Cecilia, tiene 47 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos, tres de ellos mayores de edad y el menor de  15 años  que  estudia en el colegio, dos de ellos aun  viven con ella. Su esposo trabaja en una fábrica.
Doña Cecilia tienen un taller de artesanía, allí fabrica  todo tipo de figuras las mismas que elabora en barro o en cerámica, trabaja todos los días ya que la demanda de sus productos es muy grande, ella entrega sus productos semiterminados a comerciantes de su localidad y de otras ciudades que llegan  hasta su taller ya que conocen de la calidad de sus obras, su hijo le ayuda cuando él está desocupado. Lleva más de 15 años dedicada a esta actividad la cual le encanta ya que sus obras son muy apreciadas dentro y fuera de la provincia.
Este crédito es para comprar cerámica para elaborar sus productos. Lleva 10 años en el Grupo De Crédito  y le gusta porque los créditos le son de mucha la ayuda. Su sueño es tener un mejor taller.
texts.en:
The Para el Futuro de la Mujer Communal Bank meets every two weeks in La Pila in Montecrisiti Canton. This place is very well known for its rich traditional culture where you find a great variety of handicrafts made by its inhabitants.

Sra. Cecilia, 47 years old, lives here. She is married and has four children from this relationship, three of whom are adults, while the youngest, who is 15 years old, is in school. Two of her children still live with her. Her husband works in a factory.

Doña Cecilia has a handicraft shop where she makes all kinds of figures out of clay and ceramics. She works every day because the demand for her products is very high. She delivers her products semi-finished to merchants in her area and in other cities. They come to her shop because they know the quality of her pieces. Her son helps her when he is not busy. She has produced these works for more than 15 years and she loves it because her 
craftsmanship is highly regarded both within and outside of the province.

This loan is to purchase ceramics to make her products. She has been a member of the Para el Future de la Mujer group for ten years and enjoys it because the loans  are a great help to her. Her dream is to have a better workshop.

loans.use: to purchase ceramics.

loans.name: Barchinoy

texts.ru: Барчиной 54 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. 2 дочери замужем, сын находится на заработках в России, помогает родителям материально, младшая дочь проживает с родителями. Супруг помогает по хозяйству. У Барчиной - средне-специальное образование, проработала учителем начальных классов в местной школе на протяжении 20 лет, имеет большой авторитет среди сельчан, так как выпустила очень много учеников. Позже начала заниматься торговлей, а точнее торгует женской одеждой на местном рынке. В качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи Барчиной занимается полеводством, стартовав 30 лет назад, с 2,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Барчиной, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: небольшой земельный надел мерою 0,43 ГА, на котором ежегодно сажает рис, кукурузу, хлопчатник для внутрихозяйственного использования и реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Барчиной обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку коровы для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Барчиной планирует вложить в строительство новой теплицы во дворе дома.
texts.en: Barchinoy is 54 years old and, together with her spouse, is raising 4 children.  2 of her daughters are married, her son is working in Russia and helps his parents out materially, and her youngest daughter lives with her and her husband.
