Her husband helps around the house.  Barchinoy has a secondary education and worked as a primary school teacher for 20 years.  She has a great reputation among the inhabitants of her town because she helped educate many students.  Later she began working in retail, specifically selling women's clothing at the local market.  Barchinoy's work in farming, which began 30 years ago with 2,000 KGS, serves as an additional source of income for her family.  Thanks to Barchinoy's hard work, she now has a small plot of land measuring 0.43 hectares, on which she plants rice, corn, and cotton for consumption and for resale.  Her monthly income is 10,000 KGS.  With the goal of furthering her business, Barchinoy turned to the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan to purchase a cow for breeding.  With the income she will earn from the loan, Barchinoy plans to build a new greenhouse in her yard.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Ibadat

texts.ru: Ибадат 59 лет, вдова, одна воспитывает 7 детей после смерти мужа. Супруг умер в ноябре 2013 года, Ибадат очень тяжело переживает боль и утрату своего супруга. Дети все женаты, проживают самостоятельно. Но время идет и Ибадат взяла себя в руки и продолжает жить и верить в хорошее. У Ибадат - среднее образование. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Ибадат занимается полеводством, стартовав 30 лет назад, с 2,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Ибадат, на сегодняшний день имеется: 0,54 ГА земельной доли, на которой ежегодно выращивает картофель для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Ибадат обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом -на покупку семян картофеля для посевных работ, а также минеральных удобрений для обработки земли. Доходы от кредита Ибадат планирует вложить в развитие полеводства, и планирует накопить средства на строительство нового помещения для скота, в будущем Ибадат дополнительно намерена заняться животноводством.
texts.en:
Ibadat is a 59-year-old widow. She has looked after her 7 children alone since her husband's death in November 2013. Ibadat has struggled and survived great pain and the loss of her spouse. Her children are all married and live independently. As time has passed, Ibadat has gotten herself back on her feet, and continues to live and believe things will get better. She has a secondary school education.

As the primary means of supporting her family, Ibadat raises crops. She began farming 30 years ago, with 2,000 som (KGS). Thanks to her hard work, today Ibadat has a 0.54 ha share of farmland, on which she grows potatoes for her own subsistence as well as for income. Her monthly income consists of 15,000 som (KGS). 

Ibadat has applied for a loan at "Bai Tushum" Bank to finance the purchase of mineral soil amendments and potato seeds for sowing. Credit will enable the further growth of her farm. With the income from the investment, Ibadat plans to save to further develop her fields. She also plans to save the means to build new space for livestock, as she is determined to expand into animal husbandry in the future.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Sakhina

texts.ru: Сахине 53 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 5 детей. Супруг работает почтальоном, три дочери замужем, сын в России находится на заработках, младший сын - школьник. У Сахины - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Сахина занимается полеводством, стартовав 25 лет назад, с 4,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Сахины, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: земельный надел мерою 0,48 ГА на котором ежегодно выращивает картофель для внутрихозяйственного  использования и реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). Сахина дополнительно хочет заняться животноводством, в связи с этим она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку коровы в целях обеспечения членов семьи молочными продуктами. Доходы от кредита Сахина планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Sakhina is 53 years old, married, and, together with her spouse, is raising 5 children.  Her husband works as a postman, her three daughters are married, one son lives in Russia for work, and her youngest son is still in school.  Sakhina has a secondary education.  Sakhina's work in farming, which began 25 years ago with 4,000 KGS, is the main source of income for her family.  Thanks to Sakhina's hard work, she now has a plot of land measuring 0.48 hectares, on which she raises potatoes for consumption and for resale.  Her monthly income is 15,000 KGS.  Sakhina also wants to engage in animal husbandry, and because of that turned to the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan with the goal of being able to provide members of her family with dairy products.  With the income from her loan, Sakhina plans to further increase the number of cattle in her possession, and also plans to save toward repairing her home.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Karen Jacqueline

texts.es:
En la pila de Montecristi se reúne cada quince días el Grupo De Crédito  Para el Futuro De la Mujer. Este lugar es muy conocido por su rica cultura tradicional, donde se puede encontrar una gran variedad de  artesanía elaboradas por sus habitantes.
En este lugar vive la señora Karen,tiene 24 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 5 y 3 años, el mayor estudia en escuela. Su esposo es artesano y comerciante.
Doña Karen y su esposo tienen un taller en el cual elaboran  todo tipo de figuras en barro o en cerámica, trabajan todos los días perfeccionando sus obras ya que su mejor carta de presentación es la calidad de su trabajo, es por esta razón que cuentan con muy buena clientela, ellos entregan sus obras sin pintar  a comerciantes de su localidad y de otras ciudades que llegan  hasta su taller a comprar sus obras. Llevan 3 años dedicados a esta labor pero su clientela es muy buena a pesar del poco tiempo que llevan en esta actividad la cual les da para salir adelante.
Este crédito es para comprar cerámica y barro para elaborar sus productos. Este es su tercer ciclo en el Grupo De Crédito  y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos y necesarios. Su sueño es darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The Para el Futuro de la Mujer Communal Bank meets every two weeks in La Pila in Montecrisiti Canton. This place is very well known for its rich traditional culture where you find a great variety of handicrafts made by its inhabitants.

Sra. Karen, 24 years old, lives here. She lives in a common-law relationship and has two children from this union, who are five and three years of age. The oldest attends school. Her husband is a craftsman and merchant.

Karen and her husband have a workshop where they make all kinds of figures in clay or ceramics. They work every day, perfecting their pieces, because their best calling card is the quality of their work. Consequently, they have a very good clientele. They deliver their works unpainted to merchants in their area and in other cities, who come to their workshop to purchase their work. They have been producing these pieces for three years and have a very good customer base for such a short time in the business. This encourages them to keep moving forward.

This loan is to purchase ceramics and clay to make their pieces. This is Karen’s third loan cycle in the communal bank and she likes it because the loans are quick and necessary. Her dream is to provide the best for her children.

loans.use: to purchase ceramics and clay.

loans.name: Elza

texts.ru: Эльзе 32 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 2 детей. Супруг -частный строитель. У Эльзы - среднее образование, посезонно занимается торговлей, ежегодно зимой занимается куплей-продажей молочных изделий, а летом куплей-продажей овощей и фруктов. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Эльза занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 5 лет назад, с покупки скота на 15,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Эльзы, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 1 теленок, также имеется земельный надел мерою 0,75 ГА на котором ежегодно выращивает картофель, кукурузу и овощи. Ежемесячный доход составляет 12,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Эльза обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку бычка для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Эльза планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Elza is 32 years old and married. He and her husband are bringing up two children. Her husband works as a contract worker in construction. Elza has received secondary education. She works as a vendor selling seasonal products: every year in winter she buys and resells dairy products, and in the summer--frutis and vegetables. As a main source of income for her family Elza raises livestock and grows produces, having started five years ago by buying livestock for 15,000 KGS. Thanks to Elza's hard work, her farm now includes one dairy cow and one calf. She also has a land plot of 0.75 ha [about two acres], where she plants potatoes, corn and vegetables every year. Her monthly income is 12,000 KGS. In order to develop her farm further, Elza has applied to the Bai Tushum microfinance institution for a loan to buy a bull calf and increase her livestock headcount. Elza plans to use the resulting revenue for a further increase of livestock. She also plans to save up for house renovations.

loans.use: to buy a bull calf.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn, products for resale, and a variety of seafood.

loans.name: Rajabgul

texts.ru: Ее зовут Рачабгул. Он уроженка города Душанбе - столицы Таджикистан. Ей 40 лет. И 4 года она берет заказы на шитье таджикских платьев. Шить и кроить ее научила мама. Ремесло шить и вышивать досталось от поколения к поколению. Рачабгул научалась шить давно, но 4 года назад она свой талант превратила в выгодное занятие. Сейчас Рачабул решила начать развивать свою деятельность. Она хочет купить новую модернизированную швейную машинку для того, чтобы ее работа стала выполняться быстрее и качество работы была лучше. Но ей не хватает средств для совершения покупки, поэтому она обратилась за кредитом, чтобы собрать не достающую сумму денег. Помогите ей.
texts.en: Her name is Rajabgul. She is 40 years old and was born in Dushanbe, the capital of Tajikistan. She has been sewing traditional Tajik dresses for four years. Sewing and embroidering are trades passed from generation to generation, and her mother taught her how to sew and cut patterns. Rajabgul learned to sew a long time ago, but she only decided four years ago to turn her talent into a profitable occupation. She has now decided to expand her sewing business and wants to buy a new modernized sewing machine so that she can increase her speed and quality. She does not have enough money to buy one, so she applied for a loan. Thank you for your help.

loans.use: to buy a new modernized sewing machine

loans.name: Andrea Alejandra

texts.es:
En el sitio el Limón del cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Grupo De Crédito Madres Alegres. En este lugar la mayoría de las personas se dedican a la agricultura, los deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.
En este lugar vive la señora Andrea, tiene 28 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene 4 hijos de 10, 7, 5 y 2 años de edad, los tres mayores  estudian en escuela. El marido es policía.
Doña Andrea tiene un pequeño bazar en su casa, allí vende ropa de todo tipo, zapatos, tarjetas y regalos para toda ocasión, trabaja todos los días y son tres años que tiene este negocio el cual lo empezó con el primer crédito que recibió del grupo por lo cual está muy agradecida con la institución.
Este nuevo crédito lo va utilizar en comprar ropa, zapatos y todo tipo regalos que vende en su negocio. Lleva 3 años en el grupo de crédito y le gusta porque con  el primer crédito empezó su negocio. Su sueño es darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The Madres Alegres lending group meets every two weeks in the Rocafuerte settlement of the city of Limon.  Here, most of the people are farmers and the locals are known nationwide for the delicious candies they prepare.

Angrea is 28 years old, in a common law marriage, and has four children, ages 10, 7, 5, and 2.  The three oldest attend school and her husband is a police officer.

Andrea has a small shop in her home and sells clothing, all types of shoes, outfits and gifts for all occasions.  She works every day, has had this business for three years, and started it with the money from the first loan she got from the group.  She is very grateful to the institution.  

She will use the money from this loan to buy clothing, shoes, and all types of gifts that she sells in her business.  Her dream is to provide the best for her children.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Dolores

texts.es: La señora Dolores de 21 años de edad estado civil soltera, con una instrucción de nivel primaria, vive en el municipio de Colomi, se dedica a la venta en una tienda comercial por más de 2 años y ya cuenta con mucha clientela, de esta manera se mantiene económicamente, trabajando arduamente para cubrir sus gastos de alimentación y todos los otros gastos de su vida diaria. Ya que todos sus ahorros los invirtió y no cuenta con más recursos económicos disponibles, solicita un crédito para comprar mercadería para su tienda y ofrecer mayor variedad de productos, de esta forma lograr diversificar su oferta e incrementar sus ventas, con el objetivo principal de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Sra. Dolores, 21 years old, is single and has a primary level education. She lives in the town of Colomi and has made a living through sales in her retail store for more than two years. She has many customers and is able to support herself, working hard to cover her costs for food and all the other expenses of daily life. Because she invested all of her savings and does not have other available resources, she is applying for a loan to buy merchandise for her store. In this way she can provide a larger variety of products and diversify her inventory and increase sales. Her principal objective is to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her store and offer a greater variety of products.

loans.name: Segundo Sebastian

texts.es:
En el sitio el Limón del cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Grupo De Crédito Madres Alegres. En este lugar la mayoría de las personas se dedican a la agricultura, los deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.
En este lugar vive don Segundo, tiene 36 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos de 10, 8 y 5 años que estudian en escuela. La mujer es ama de casa. 
El señor Segundo es un hombre que le ha tocado trabajar duro para sacar adelante a su familia, el tiene una panga ( bote pequeño de trasporte y pesca) en la ciudad de Manta en la cual se dedica al trasporte de personal, tres veces por semana transporta personas desde la playa hacia  los barcos pesqueros que se encuentras mar adentro, así mismo el transporta a estas personas desde los barcos a la playa, también en ciertos días se dedica a la pesca por lugares cercanos, su trabajo es duro y a veces peligrosos pero él lo realiza por el bien  de su familia.
Este crédito es para realizar ciertos arreglos a su bote. Este es su cuarto ciclo en el grupo de crédito y le gusta porque se siente muy bien en el grupo. Su sueño es comprar una lancha nueva y más grande.
texts.en:
The Madres Alegres lending group meets every two weeks in the Rocafuerte settlement of the city of Limon.  Here, most of the people are farmers and the locals are known nationwide for the delicious candies they prepare.

Segundo lives here.  He is 36 years old, is in a common law marriage, and has three children, ages 10, 8 and 5 who attend school.  His wife is a housewife.

Segundo is a man who has had to work hard to get his family ahead.  He has a dinghy (small transport and fishing boat) in the city of Manta, where he transports people.  Three times a week he provides personal transportation and three times a week he takes people from the beach to the fishing boats on the inner sea.  He also brings people from the boats to the beach.  On certain days he fishes in nearby areas.  His work is hard and sometimes dangerous, but he does it for the good of his family.

He will use the money from this loan to fix up his boat.  This will be his fourth loan through the lending group and he likes it because he feels comfortable with them.  His dream is to buy a new and bigger boat.

loans.use: to fix up his boat.

loans.name: María Estrella

texts.es:
En el sitio el Limón del cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Grupo De Crédito Madres Alegres. En este lugar la mayoría de las personas se dedican a la agricultura, los deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.
En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 56 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen seis hijos tres mayores y tres de  17, 15 y 12 años que estudian en colegio y escuela, los tres menores aun viven con ella. Su esposo es agricultor. 
Doña María es artesana en la rama de corte y confección y con la finalidad de obtener sus propios ingresos y aprovechando sus conocimientos en corte y confección puso en su casa un pequeño taller de costura,  el mismo que con el paso de los años lo ha ido aumentando, allí ella se dedica a confeccionar todo tipo de ropa, también desde hace tres años tiene convenios con el Estado para los cuales elabora una gran cantidad de uniformes de escuelas y colegios, razón por lo cual en esos días tiene que contratar personal, pero normalmente trabaja con una hija todo el año. Ella lleva más de 28 años en esta actividad con la cual está muy contenta.
Este nuevo crédito lo va utilizar en comprar telas y otros materiales para la costura. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo de Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que siempre le dan. Su sueño es tener un taller en el centro de la ciudad.
texts.en:
The Madres Alegres lending group meets every two weeks in the Rocafuerte settlement of the city of Limon.  Here, most of the people are farmers and the locals are known nationwide for the delicious candies they prepare.

Maria lives here.  She is 56 years old, married, and has six children, three adults and three ages 17, 15, and 12 who attend high school.  The three youngest still live with her.  Her husband is a farmer.

Maria makes clothing and took advantage of her skills to set up a small sewing workshop in her home so she could earn her own income.  She has grown her workshop over time and she makes all types of clothing.  She has also had a deal with the state for the past three years where she makes a large number of school uniforms and has had to hire people recently, but she usually works with her daughter year round.  She has been doing this for more than 28 years and is very happy with it.

She will use the money from this loan to buy fabric and other sewing supplies.  She has been with the lending group from the beginning and likes the help they give her.  Her dream is to have a workshop in the city center.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Angela

texts.es: Doña Angela, ha sido madre y padre a la vez, con muchos esfuerzos saco adelante a sus hijos, labora como asistente del hogar, esta señora de escasos recursos económicos requiere el crédito para mejorar las condiciones de su hogar, en este caso el cambio del techo de su vivienda, para garantizar la tranquilidad y seguridad.
texts.en:
Doña Angela has had to assume the role of both mother and father at the same time. Through her many efforts, she has been able to help her children move forward. Angela works as a domestic helper.

This woman who has limited financial resources is in need of a loan so that she can improve her household conditions. In this instance, she will replace the roof of her house, which will provide peace and security.

loans.use: to buy zinc sheets and crossbeams, as well as pay for labor.

loans.name: Nicol Vanessa

texts.es:
Ella es Nicol Vanesa es una adolecente de 17 años, ella quiere estudiar Técnico Laboral en Salud Oral por varias razones, Porque esta profesión le permitirá contribuir al mejoramiento de la salud oral y de esta manera elevar la autoestima de las personas, Porque es una excelente posibilidad de superación en la vida, Porque ella piensa que este es un gran pasó para cumplir el verdadero sueño que es llegar a ser odontóloga. 
En este momento ella no cuenta con la mejor situación económica para poder cumplir con la totalidad del pago de las mensualidades, por esta razón solicita amablemente la colaboración al convenio de Kiva  para el pago de las cuotas.
texts.en:
This is Nicol Vanesa.  She is a 17 year old young lady who wants to study to become an oral health technician for a number of reasons, because this profession will allow her to contribute to the betterment of oral health and increase people’s self-esteem.  It’s an excellent opportunity because she feels that this will be a great step toward achieving her true dream of becoming a dentist.

She doesn’t have the best financial situation at this time and can’t pay the monthly tuition, so she is asking for Kiva’s help to make her payments.

loans.use: to pay tuition.

loans.name: Manuel Javier

texts.es:
Manuel tiene 33 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Oyotún, una zona donde la población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo, que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales menores patos, gallinas, gallos, pollos, cuyes, desde hace más de 10 años, su negocio se encuentra ubicada en la parte posterior a su domicilio, con la ayuda de su esposa comercializan sus animales ofreciéndolo en el mercado de la zona y a los restaurants de su distrito.

Manuel ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para su granja de animales y de esta manera poder ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Manuel is 33 years old and lives together with his wife and children in the Oyotún district, a zone where the population makes a living from agriculture, commerce and animal husbandry, located in the Chiclayo Province in the Lambayeque Region, in the north coast of Peru.

He makes a living from raising and selling small animals: ducks, hens, roosters, chickens and guinea pigs. He has done this for more than 10 years, with his business being located in the back of his home, where together with his wife they sell their animals, which are sold in the market and to the restaurants in their district.

Manuel is requesting a 2 000 nuevo soles loan for the purchase of balanced food for his animal farm.

loans.use: to buy balanced food to fatten his animals

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase goods and renovate his workplace.

loans.name: Malaver Isabel

texts.es:
Isabel tiene 68 años de edad, vive junto a su familia, en el distrito de Cayalti, una comunidad ubicada sobre el valle de Zaña, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, que pertenece a la Provincia de Chiclayo, Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella tiene una bodeguita donde ofrece productos de primera necesidad, su negocio está ubicado en su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de variedad de productos sacos de azúcar, arroz, menestras, aceite , leche entre otros para ofrecer a sus clientes y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Isabel is 68 years old and lives with her family in the district of Cayalti, a community located in the Zana Valley. Its population earns its living through agriculture, trade, and raising livestock. Cayalti belongs to the province of Chiclayo in the Lambayeque region along Peru's northern coast.

Isabel has a small store which provides basic necessities. Her business is located in her home. She has requested a loan of 1,000 Peruvian soles to purchase a variety of products such as bags of sugar, rice, beans, cooking oil, milk, and others to provide staples for her customers and, therefore, generate more revenue for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase diverse products for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase woods, fabric, and sponges.

loans.name: Ibodat

texts.ru:
Ибодату из городка Худжанд 52 года. Город Худжанд находиться на северной части Таджикистана. Климат и природа Худжанда отличается от других мест Таджикистана. В Худжанде часто льет дождь, и бывают ветра. В этом городе Ибодат с мужем живет давно. У них есть трое дочек. Они все замужем и имеют своих семей. 
  Ибодат очень любит детей и ее работа прочно связанна с ними. Она 5 лет занимается торговлей детских игрушек. Ибодату нравится ее работа. Она хочет продолжить свою работу в этой сфере деятельности и берет кредит, чтобы привести больше товара. Когда у нее будет больше товара, увеличится спрос и она приобретет больше клиентов. Помогите ей осуществить планы. Поддержите ее!
texts.en: Ibodat, from the city of Khujand, is 52 years old. Khujand is in the northern part of Tajikistan. The climate and environment are different from other parts of Tajikistan. In Khujand there is a lot of rain and wind. Ibodat and her husband have long lived in this city. They have three daughters, who are all married and have their own children. Ibodat loves children and her work is closely tied to them. For five years she has been selling children's toys. Ibodat enjoys her work. She wants to continue her work in this area and lake out a loan to buy more goods. When she has a large inventory there will be more demand and she will get more customers. Help her fulfill her goals. Support her!

loans.use: To buy childrens toys for resale

loans.name: Nardia Pamela

texts.es:
Nardia Pamela tiene 44 años de edad, vive junto a su familia en el distrito de Pucara, un distrito que cuanta con luz y agua, conocida por un clima caluroso, su población en la mayoría se dedica al cultivo de frutales que lo comercializa en la ciudad de Chiclayo, también se dedican a la ganadería, este distrito se ubica en la Provincia de Jaen que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza cremas, cosméticos, perfumes entre otros, es conocida por que ella asesora a sus clientes y cuenta con clientela considerable, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de variedad de productos y de esta manera ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Nardia Pamela is 44 year old. She lives with her family in the Pucara district, a district with electricity and water service. It is known for its warm climate. Most of the population work growing fruit that is sold in the city of Chiclayo and also they work in livestock. This district is located in the province of Jaen that belongs to the Catamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru.

She works selling beauty cream products, cosmetics, and perfumes among others. She is known for providing advice to her customers and has a significant number of clients. She has asked for a loan through Edpyme Alternative of 1,500 soles in order to buy a variety of products that she can offer her customers.

loans.use: to buy a variety of beauty products

loans.name: Amelia Del Rocio

texts.es:
Amelia del Roció tiene 38 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo e hijos en e distrito de Buenos Aires, desde hace más de 20 años, tienen una casita propia donde residen, su población en la comunidad se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Morropon, que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de chicha de jora y clarito helado todos los fines de semana, es muy conocida por la actividad que realiza, ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra de sacos de maíz, azúcar para la preparación de sus bebidas y una segunda parte para comprar puertas y ventanas para su vivienda y de esta manera tener un lugar seguro para residir.
texts.en:
Amelia del Roció is 38 years old and lives with her husband and children in the district of Buenos Aires, where she has lived for over 20 years. They have their own house in which they reside. Their community is involved in agriculture, trade, and raising livestock. Buenos Aires is located in the province of Morropon in the region of Piura along the northern coast of Peru.

Amelia sells a local beverage known as "chicha de jora" and ice cream on the weekends. She is well known for this activity. She has asked Edpyme Alternative for a loan of 2,000 Peruvian soles to buy bags of corn and sugar for preparing her beverages. She also wants to buy windows and doors for her home to have a safer place to reside.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for making chicha, a local beverage.

loans.name: Magali

texts.es:
Magali tiene 43 años de edad, vive junto a sus hijos en el distrito de Pucará, una ciudad de clima cálido, su población se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de frutales, arroz, cafeto entre otros, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén, que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa para damas, productos de belleza, su tienda está ubicada en el centro de la ciudad, lleva realizando esta actividad desde hace 10 años y ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de variedad de ropa para ofrecer a sus clientes y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Magali is 43 years old. She lives together with her children in the district of Pucará, a city with a warm climate. Its population works in agriculture, especially growing fruits, rice, and coffee, among other crops, and also in commerce and livestock raising. It is located in the Province of Jaén, which belongs to the Cajamarca Region in the northern mountains of Peru.

Magali works selling women's clothing and beauty products. Her store is located in the city center. She has done this work for 10 years, and she has requested a loan for 3,000 Peruvian new soles to buy a variety of clothing to offer to her customers. In this way she will generate a better income for her family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothing to offer her customers.

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es:
Maritza tiene 44 años de edad, vive junto a sus hijos en el distrito de Pucará una ciudad de clima caluroso, su población se dedica a la agricultura, especialmente al cultivo de arroz, frutales y cafeto, comercio y ganadería ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén, que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

La actividad que realiza es la venta de abarrotes en general así como la venta de verduras y pollo al por mayor y menor, cuenta con clientela propia de la zona especialmente de los restaurants, ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 500 nuevos soles para la compra de variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Maritza is 44 years old. She lives with her children in the district of Pucará, an area in a hot climate. Its population is involved in agriculture, especially the cultivation of rice, fruit, and coffee, as well as trade and raising livestock. They are located in the province of Jaén which is in the region of Cajamarca in the northern highlands of Peru.

Her business activity is selling general groceries, especially vegetables and chicken wholesale and retail. She has her own clientele built up, especially at restaurants. Martiza has requested a loan of 2,500 Peruvian soles to purchase a variety of products to offer her customers and, therefore, generate more income for her family.

loans.use: to purchase various products including vegetables and chickens.

loans.name: Robiyakhon

texts.ru: Робияхон 42 года, не замужем воспитывает одну дочь. В 2006 году, Робияхон начала бизнес в торговле женскими вещами, используя в качестве стартового капитала сумму в 25,000 сом (KGS). Сумев развить свой бизнес и обретя постоянных клиентов, Робияхон имеет среднемесячный доход в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду в бизнесе, Робияхон  смогла наладить бизнес, найти постоянных клиентов и каналы сбыта товаров. В целях дальнейшего увеличения и расширения своего бизнеса, Робияхон обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом на увеличение товарооборота. Доходы от кредита Робияхон планирует вложить в завершение стройки жилого дома и накопить деньги на проведение свадебного торжества для дочери.
texts.en: Robiyakhon is 42 years old, unmarried, and has one daughter. In 2006 she began a business selling women's clothing with 25,000 som (KGS) in starting capital. Having grown the business and won regular customers, Robiyakhon has an average monthly income of 20,000 som (KGS). Thanks to her tireless work with the business, Robiyakhon has been able to establish the business, and find loyal customers and ways to market her goods. With the goal of further expanding and developing her business, Robiyakhon asked Bai-Tushum for a loan to increase inventory turnaround. She plans to invest income from use of the loan into finishing construction of a house, and also to save money for her daughter's wedding.

loans.use: to buy wholesale women's clothing for retail

loans.name: Ainur

texts.ru: Айнур 48 лет, замужем, имеет 2 детей. С 2007 года Айнур начала заниматься розничной торговлей тканей на местном рынке, стартовав с суммой в 10,000 сом (KGS), Айнур сумела развить свой бизнес с ежемесячным доходом в сумме около 20,000 сом (KGS). В целях расширения ассортимента тканей, Айнур обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом. Айнур планирует вложить доходы от бизнеса в дальнейшее увеличение ассортимента товара, а также в будущем хочет сделать ремонт дома.
texts.en: Ainur is 48 years old, married, and has two children. Since 2007 she has been selling fabric wholesale at the local market. Since starting with 10,000 som (KGS), she has grown her business to where she earns a monthly income of around 20,000 som (KGS). In order to expand her fabric inventory Ainur came to Bai-Tushum for a loan. She plans to invest income from the business into further expanding her inventory, and she also hopes to make repairs to her home in the future.

loans.use: to buy wholesale dressmaking supplies for retailers

loans.name: Hasan

texts.ru: Хасан 28 летний житель городка Куляб. Он женат. Хасан вырос в простой семье фермеров. Он с раннего детства наблюдал за родными и соседями, когда они работали на скотном дворе. В Кулябе и в других местах Республики Таджикистана основным видом деятельности является сельскохозяйственные промышленности. Хасан очень долго хотел начать бизнес в сфере животноводства, ведь он умеет ухаживать за скотами, имеет достаточный опыт работы, корм для скотов и коровник для них. Хасану необходимо получить финансирование для того, чтобы начать бизнес, потому что самостоятельно он не в состоянии сделать задуманное. Помогите Хасану купить скотов и начать новый бизнес и дать его семье новые экономические возможности.
texts.en: Hasan is a 28 year old resident of the city of Kulob. He grew up in a simple family of farmers. Since early childhood he watched his relatives and neighbors as they worked with animals in the farm yard. In Kulob and other parts of Tajikistan agriculture is the main form of industry. Hasan has long wanted to begin a business in the animal husbandry sphere, since he knows how to care for animals, and has enough experience, feed, and a barn for them. Hasan needs financing in order to start the business, since he isn't in the position to implement his plans himself. Help Hasan buy animals and begin a new business and give his family new economic resources.

loans.use: Buy livestock and begin an animal husbandry business

loans.name: Djumakan

texts.ru: Джумакан 61 год, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 2 детей. У Джумакан - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Джумакан занимается животноводством, стартовав 30 лет назад, с покупки скота на 1,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Джумакан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 2 овцы. Ежемесячный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Джумакан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Джумакан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку квартиры для внуков.
texts.en: Djumakan is 61 years old, married, and has two children with her spouse. Djumakan has a high school education, and practices animal husbandry to earn the primary source of income for her family. She began 30 years ago with the purchase of 1,000 som (KGS) worth of livestock. Thanks to her tireless work, she now owns a dairy cow and two sheep. Her monthly income is 15,000 som (KGS). With the goal of further developing her business Djumakan came to Bai-Tushum for a loan to buy cows to expand her herd. She plans to invest income from the loan into further growing her number of livestock, and she plans to save money to buy apartments for her grandchildren.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Segundo Tomas

texts.es:
En El Grupo De Crédito María Del Carmen se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla, ciudad de clima fresco y con muchos atractivos turísticos propios de la zona.
En este lugar vive don Segundo, el tiene 59 años de edad, está casado y fruto de esta relación tiene cuatro hijos mayores de edad. Su esposa es ama de casa. 
El señor Segundo se dedica a la venta de pescado, él compra el pescado en la ciudad de Manta y luego en un carro que alquila lo vende en su ciudad y en cantones aledaños,  se dedica a este negocio más de 30 años y le ha ido muy bien. 
El está repitiendo el crédito ya que con ellos el financia su negocio, sus ganancias las invierte para satisfacer las necesidades del hogar. Este crédito lo va a invertir en comprar pescado. Está en el Grupo De Crédito desde hace más de 4 años  y le gusta por la ayuda. Su sueño es comprar un carro.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “María Del Carmen” meets every 15 days in the canton of Montecristi. This place is known for its famous Panama hats. The city experiences cold weather and there are many tourist attractions in the area.

Don Segundo lives in this place. He is 59 years old, married, and has four grown children. His wife is a homemaker.

Sr. Segundo sells fish. He buys the fish in the city of Manta and then sells his products from a rented car. He conducts his sales within his city and in the neighboring cantons. Segundo has been in this business for more than 30 years and is doing very well.

He is requesting another loan so that he can use the money to finance his business. His profits will be used to satisfy the household needs. This loan will be invested in the purchase of fish. Segundo has been with the Communal Bank for more than four years and enjoys having the assistance. His dream is to buy a car.

loans.use: to buy fish.

loans.name: Valentin

texts.es:
Valentín tiene 67 años de edad, vive junto a sus hijos en el caserío de Huacapampa, una zona rural del distrito de Cañaris, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Ferreñafe, que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la carpintería desde hace 13 años, tallando madera para mesas, sillas, bancas, puertas entre otros, ha solicitado un préstamo de 2501 nuevos soles para la compra de madera para realizar sus trabajos y de esta manera ofrecerlo a sus clientes, generándole mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Valentín is 67 years old. He lives with his children in the village of Huacapampa, a rural district of Cañaris. Located in the Province of Ferreñafe in the Lambayeque Region of northern Peru, its population is engaged in agriculture, trade, and livestock.

He has been doing carpentry for 13 years, carving wood for tables, chairs, benches, and doors among others. He is requesting a loan of 2501 soles to buy wood to carry out his jobs and thus offer them to his customers, thereby generating more income for his family.

loans.use: to buy wood for carpentry work

loans.name: Maria Rosa

texts.es:
María Rosa tiene 52 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo e hijos en el distrito de Cayalti, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, esta comunidad se caracteriza por grandes depósitos de arena y ripio, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo, que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella tiene una panadería donde ofrece diversos tipos de panes, galletas, tortas entre otras, ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra de diversos insumos para la preparación de sus productos y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en: María Rosa is 52 years old. She lives with her husband and children in the district of Cayalti, whose population works in agriculture, commerce and livestock. This community is characterized by its big deposits of sand and gravel. It is located in the Province of Chiclayo, which is part of the Lambayeque region on the north coast of Peru. María Rosa has a bakery where she sells diverse types of bread, cookies, and cakes, among other items. She has sought a loan of $725 to purchase a variety of supplies for the preparation of her products so that she can generate higher earnings for her family.

loans.use: to purchase supplies to make pastries for a bakery.

loans.name: Herminio

texts.es:
Herminio tiene 55 años de edad, vive junto a sus hijos en el distrito de Cayalti una comunidad donde la población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada a una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo, que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica al transporte de pasajeros en su trimovil propio desde hace 8 años recorriendo las comunidades pequeñas al exterior del centro de Cayalti, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de accesorios para su vehículo y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en: Herminio is 55 years old. He lives together with his children in the district of Cayalti, a community where the population works in agriculture, commerce and livestock. It is located an hour outside of the city of Chiclayo which is part of the Lambayeque region on the north coast of Peru. Herminio works transporting passengers in his own rickshaw. For 8 years he has traveled through the small communities outside of the center of Cayalti. He has sought a loan of $375 to purchase accessories for his vehicle so that he can generate higher earnings for his family.

loans.use: to purchase accessories for his vehicle.

loans.name: Pedro Pablo

texts.es:
Pedro Pablo tiene 59 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Pomahuaca, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la provincia de Jaen, que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Ella tiene se dedica al comercio, cuenta con una bodega ubicada en su domicilio donde ofrece productos de primera necesidad, cuenta con clientela considerable por la amabilidad y el buen servico que brindan, ha solcitado uun préstamo de 2 501 nuevos soles para la compra de diversisdad de productos sacos de arroz, azúcar, aceite, leche entre otros y de esta maneraofrecer a sus clientes y generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Pedro Pablo is 59 years old.  He lives together with his wife and children in the Pomahuaca district.  The people there work in agriculture, business, and ranching.  It is located in the Jaen province, which belongs to the Cajamarca region, in the northern sierra of Peru.

Pedro Pablo works in retail.  He has a small grocery store located in his home where he offers basic necessities.  He has a large customer base thanks to his friendliness and the good customer service that he offers.  He has requested a loan of 2,501 nuevos soles to buy a variety of products to offer to his customers: bags of rice, sugar, oil, and milk, among others.  In this way, he can generate a greater income for his family.

loans.use: to buy various products to stock his business.

loans.name: Deive

texts.es:
Deive tiene 31 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Oyotún, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a brindar servicios de jornalearía en las fincas de su vecinos y las personas que lo contratan, cuenta con sus propias herramientas y se dedica a esta labor desde hace 11 años, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de insumos agrícolas para el mantenimiento de equipos y herramientas y de esta manera seguir brindando el servicio.
texts.en: Deive is 31 years old. He lives together with his wife and children in the district of Oyotún, whose populations works in agriculture, commerce and livestock. It is located in the province of Chiclayo which is part of the Lambayeque region on the north coast of Peru. Deive works by providing his services as a laborer on the lands of his neighbors and those who hire him. He relies on his own tools and he has worked in this trade for 11 years. He has sought a loan for $550 to purchase supplies for the maintenance of his equipment and tools so that he can continue providing his services.

loans.use: to purchase supplies to maintain his equipment.

loans.name: Saroeurn

texts.en:
Saroeurn, age 56, lives in a village about 30 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. She has three sons and four daughters. Three of her children are married, one is a garment worker, two attend school, and another is a motor taxi driver who assists his parents in their farming business when he is free. 

Saroeurn and her husband are rice famers. They grow rice on their farmland in the village where they live. 

Saroeurn is applying for a loan to buy fertilizer and pay for plowing fees.

Photo: Saroeurn is at home, not at her farm.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pay for plowing fees

loans.name: Izatdjon

texts.ru:
Изатджон жительница Б.Гафуровского района города Худжанд. Она 33-летняя замужняя женщина и мать двоих детей. Старшему ребенку 10 лет и он учится в школе, а младшему 4 года и он ходит в детский сад. В данный момент Изатджон живет в доме с детьми и свекровью, а муж находится на заработках за рубежом. 
Изатджон имеет высшее образование, но работает дома швеей. Ей нравится кроить и шить платья разных фасонов. Более 5 лет она занимается швейным делом и теперь хочет расширить свое дело. Изатджон просит кредит, чтобы приобрести новую модернизированную вышивальную машинку для шитья и вышивки. Она планирует брать больше заказов и увеличить количество своих клиенток. Она надеется на вашу помощь.
texts.en:
Izatdjon lives in the B. Gafurovsky region of the city of Khujand. She is 33 years old and she is married with two children. Her elder child is 10 and in elementary school and her younger child is 4 and goes to kindergarten. At the moment, Izatdjon lives at home with her children and her mother-in-law, but her husband is a migrant worker abroad.

Izatdjon has a higher education, but she works at home as a seamstress. She likes to tailor and sew various styles of dresses. She has been a seamstress for over five years and she now wants to expand her business. Izatdjon is asking for a loan to buy a new, up-to-date sewing machine for sewing and embroidery. She plans to take more commissions and increase her number of clients. She is counting on your help.

loans.use: to buy a new up-to-date sewing machine for sewing and embroidery.

loans.name: Soban

texts.en:
Soban lives in a Phnom Pen suburb. She has been married since 2007 and has two young children: one son and one daughter. 

Soban is a garment worker, while her husband raises pigs and produces rice wine at home. She wanted to buy a motorcycle for family transportation, so she bought it. But, she has not yet paid for it. 

Hence, Soban is asking for a loan to pay for the purchase. She will use the rest of the loan amount to assist in her husband’s pig farming business by buying more piglets to raise. 	

Photo: Soban and her husband.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike for family transportation as well as to assist in her husband’s pig farming business by buying more piglets to raise

loans.name: Sokhom

texts.en:
Sokhom (in the photo) lives in a village across the Mekong River about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh City. He has one son, who is a construction worker, and four daughters, who are in school.  

Sokhom is a mason, while his wife is a garment worker. He has just built a new house to live in, but some parts are still remaining. Hence, he decided to apply for a loan to make the finishes.

loans.use: To finish his house building.

loans.name: Siep

texts.en:
Siep is 54 years old and lives in a village not far from Phnom Penh City. She has three sons--one is married and lives outside the family home and other two are garment workers. Her husband is a construction worker. 

Siep stays at home; the main source of income is from her sons' and husband’s salaries. She is in the process of building a new house (shown in picture) and she lacks money to finish it. Hence she decided to apply for a loan to finish.

loans.use: To finish building her house.

loans.name: Santos Saturdino

texts.es:
Santos Saturdino tiene 40 años de edad, vive junto a su hijo en el Caserío de Lishinas una zona rural del distrito de de Pucará, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Ella tiene una mototaxi propia con la cual brinda servicio de transporte público en el distrito de pucara, dedicándose a esta actividad desde hace tres años, también cuenta con sus cultivos de pan llevar, ha solicitado un préstamo de 500 nuevos soles para la compra de accesorios para su vehículo y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Santos Saturdino is 40 years old and lives with his son in the settlement of Lishinas, a rural area in Pucará district, located in Jaén province, which is part of Cajamarca region in the northern highlands of Peru.  Its population works in agriculture, commerce, and livestock grazing. 

He has his own mototaxi which he uses to provide public transportation service in Pucará district, and has been doing this work for three years. He also has his staple crops. 

He has requested a loan of 500 nuevos soles  to purchase accessories for his vehicle and this way generate greater income for his family.

loans.use: To buy accessories for his vehicle.

loans.name: Chanly

texts.en:
Chanly is 29 years old and lives in a village about twenty kilometers from Phnom Penh City. She has two young children: one son and one daughter.  Chanly is a rice farmer. Her husband is a security guard for a company and also assists his wife in the farming business when he is free. 

Anyways, the house where Chanly’s family lives (shown in the photo) is old in some parts, especially the wooden stilts. She wants to replace them and make them stronger by changing from wooden stilts to concrete stilts. Hence, she decided to apply for a loan for this purpose and to pay for fees.

loans.use: to replace the stilts of the house where she lives

loans.name: Sophal

texts.en:
Sophal (in the photo), age 31, lives in a village about 13 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. She has been married since 2004. 

Sophal is a garment worker, while her husband has full-time employment. She is asking for a loan to purchase a motorcycle for her husband to drive to work because he does not have his own motorbike. He takes a motorbike with his uncle very often.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for her husband to drive to work

loans.name: Sophak

texts.en:
Sophak (pictured here) is 34 years old, a widow with two daughters. Both her daughters attend school.  She lives with her parents in a village about 13 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. 
Sophak is a farmer. She grows papaya and tomatoes on their farmland in the village where they live. 
Sophak want to buy the neighboring land to expand her property. She will add her own money to the requested loan to make the purchase.

loans.use: To add to her own money to buy the neighboring land to expand her property.

loans.name: Sreun

texts.en:
Sreun (pictured here) buys and sells fruits while her husband is a rice farmer who assists in his wife’s business when he is free. Sreun wants to buy a remoque because it can carry more fruit than a motorbike. That’s why she decided to apply for a loan.

She lives in a village across the Mekong River about 15 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. She has two sons and three daughters. Two of her children have full-time employment, one is a garment worker and the other two attend school. 

A remoque is a motorbike with a trailer attached at the back.

loans.use: To buy a remoque (motorbike with trailer) to carry fruits to sell

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en: Despite the hardship of living, Marilyn aims to become successful and financially stable in the future. She is 37 years old, married, and has four school-age children. Due to the high cost of commodities and school fees, she engages in buying and selling fruits and vegetables to supplement her husband's income. She plans to acquire more stocks of fruits and vegetables, but she has limited capital. For this reason, she is asking for a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy the additional stocks of fruits and vegetables to sell. Through this loan, she believes that she will be able to make her business more profitable.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Noen

texts.en:
Noen is 39 years old and a married mother of three school-going children. She lives with her spouse and children in a small village of Bakan district in Pursat province. From there she owns rice farm and does farming activities alongside her spouse to support their family needs. She has been in this occupation for almost 20 years and earns approximately USD 6.00 per day.

As this is her first loan she aims to use the loan for sanitation improvement practices by building a household latrine for the sake of her family members. This loan will allow her cover the overall costs of the construction. Thanks to the water loan program with a special rate offered by Hattha Kaksekar Limited (HKL), Noen is encouraged to focus on ensuring healthy living conditions, to safeguard the health of her family and to protect the environment.

loans.use: to build a household latrine.

loans.name: Divina

texts.en: Divina engages herself in planting and selling her vegetables within her village. She is 44 years old and has five school-age children. Due to high cost of school fees, Divina plans to plant more vegetables to sell, but she has a shortage of capital. With regards to this matter, she is requesting a loan of PHP 30,000.00 to buy fertilizer and insecticide needed in vegetable production. She hopes that lenders will grant her requested loan to further expand her vegetable planting to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and insecticide needed in her vegetable production

loans.name: Marina

texts.en: Marina is 40 years old and widowed. She lives in  a rural community with her four children. To generate additional income, she engages in the buying and selling of fruits and vegetables within the local community. She aims to improve her business but she has insufficient capital. For this reason, she is asking for a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy more stock of fruits and vegetables to sell. She hopes that someday she will be able to improve the business through this financial assistance.

loans.use: to buy more stock of fruits and vegetables to sell

location.town: Brgy. Lamo, Dupax del Norte, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn previously accessed a loan of 50,000 PHP that she used to buy additional stocks of merchandise such as undergarments needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help in their personal, household and business expenditures.
 
Evelyn would like to apply for another loan of 25,000 PHP to buy additional stocks of merchandise such as undergarments needed in her business. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. Her profits from business will definitely help sustain her family's daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Evelyn hopes to be more successful in business and dreams to help her grandchildren with their education. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of their lives and business every week.  There she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay their Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional stocks of merchandise such as undergarments needed in her business

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
Victoria is thankful for the financial assistance extended to her. She was able to buy more frozen and processed foods needed in her business. Her loan also helped, not just in her business, but also in the education of her children. Her income from her business is assisting her family's everyday household expenditures. She and her husband are working hard to provide for their family's everyday needs.

She would like to apply for another 20,000 PHP loan to buy additional processed meat and frozen food needed for her business. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. Her profits from business will definitely help her sustain her daily needs and the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Victoria hopes that her business will be more flourishing and dreams to have a better living. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members weekly to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional processed meat and frozen food needed for her business
